ship_action.name: This President Is Not Above The Law

name: Investigator Odo
flavor: Odo was pressed into service by the Cardassians during the Occupation of Bajor.

name: Constable Odo
flavor: Chief of Security on Deep Space Nine, Odo was a constant presence onboard the station.

name: Trader Odo
flavor: Disguised as a trader, Odo joined the Defiant crew in preventing the assassination of Captain Kirk by a time-traveling Klingon.

name: Umpire Odo
flavor: As an impartial observer, Odo was asked to be the umpire for a baseball game between the Niners and the Logicians.

name: Stranded Odo
flavor: Stranded after a runabout crash, Odo and Quark were forced to cooperate to survive.

name: Miranda Jones
flavor: Having studied on Vulcan for many years, Dr. Miranda Jones gained control of her telepathic abilities. Born blind she is immune to the affects of the Medusans, whose ambassador she accompanies aboard the Enterprise.

ship_action.name: Violent Emotion is a Kind of Insanity

name: Martia
flavor: A Chameloid prisoner of Rura Penthe, Martia attempted to sabotage Kirk and McCoy's escape in exchange for a pardon.

name: Captain Klaa
flavor: Eager to gain fame by defeating Kirk, Captain Klaa engaged the Enterprise-A at Nimbus III.

name: Wyatt Miller
flavor: Cancelling his wedding with Deanna, Wyatt joins the Tarellians in the hopes of helping them find a cure to the virus that has nearly wiped out their civilization.

ship_action.name: What I Want Is To Cure People
It's Not The Weapon, It's The Soldier

name: Subcommander T'Rul
flavor: As part of a Federation-Romulan treaty, T'Rul was posted to the Defiant to operate the cloaking device.

name: Ensign Ro
flavor: A headstrong and proud Bajoran, Ro Laren assisted Captain Picard and his crew in tracking down a group of terrorists.

name: Maquis Ro Laren
flavor: Sent to infiltrate a Maquis cell, Ro Laren instead joined the fight against the Cardassians.

name: Shinzon
flavor: A clone of Jean-Luc Picard, Shinzon captained the mighty Scimitar warship against the U.S.S. Enterprise-E.

name: Will Riker
flavor: First Officer for the U.S.S. Enterprise-D, William Riker went on to have a storied career in Starfleet.

name: Lt. Thomas Riker
flavor: Split from William Riker in a transporter accident, Thomas Riker was stranded alone for eight years.

name: Commander Riker
flavor: When off-duty, Commander Riker often held poker nights for his fellow bridge officers.

name: Admiral Riker
flavor: Originally from Q's final test of Picard, Admiral Riker used the Enterprise-D to seal an anti-time rift.

name: Mintakan Riker
flavor: On a mission to gauge cultural contamination on Mintaka, Riker presented himself as a Mintakan trader.

name: U.S.S. Zheng He Riker
flavor: Leaving a life of bunnicorn sausage pizza temporarily behind him, Riker brought the U.S.S. Zheng He to the aid of Picard on Coppelius.

name: A.G. Robinson
flavor: The first human to break Warp 2 and survive ejection in an escape pod. Destroyed 1 of 2 NX Prototypes, almost ending the NX Project.

name: Captain Morgan Bateson
flavor: Captain of the U.S.S. Bozeman, Morgan Bateson was stuck in a temporal loop for nearly 80 years.

name: Socrates
flavor: A part of the Emergency Medical Holoprograms personality enrichment program that led to unintended results.

ship_action.name: I know one thing, and that is that I know nothing

name: Edith Keeler
flavor: Edith administered a New York mission, near where Kirk was forced to allow her to die in traffic to preserve his timeline.

name: Ensign Tuvok
flavor: Ensign on the U.S.S. Excelsior under Captain Sulu, Ensign Tuvok was present for the rescue of James Kirk and Leonard McCoy.

name: Security Chief Tuvok
flavor: Security Chief for Captain Janeway, and former infiltrator of the Maquis ship Val Jean.

name: Maquis Tuvok
flavor: On a mission from Starfleet to infiltrate the Maquis, Tuvok joined Chakotay's ship and cell.

name: Altan Inigo Soong
flavor: Working with Sutra, Soong built a beacon to contact the protectors of synthetic life for the creations he considered his children.

ship_action.name: I Suppose That's What Mothers Do

name: Mirror Intendant Kira
flavor: Intendant of the Bajor Sector for the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance, Kira was captured by the Terran Rebellion.

name: Disguised Kira
flavor: Disguised as a Bajoran prisoner, Kira snuck into a Cardassian camp to rescue Resistance leader Li Nalas.

name: Cardassian Kira
flavor: Kira was kidnapped and modified by the Obsidian Order in a plot to reveal the dissident Tekeny Ghemor.

name: Niners Kira Nerys
flavor: Kira joined Sisko's baseball team, playing shortstop for the Niners against the Vulcan Logicians.

name: Anastasia Komananov
flavor: After a transporter accident, Kira's image is used by a holosuite program to display a Soviet secret agent.

name: Commander Kira Nerys
flavor: To facilitate contact with the Cardassian rebels, Kira was given a Starfleet field commission.

name: Breen Disguise Kira
flavor: A disguised Kira helps Dukat see reason before harm comes to his daughter.

name: Security Chief Worf
flavor: Security Chief for the U.S.S. Enterprise-D, he was the first Klingon to graduate from Starfleet Academy.

name: Defiant Commander Worf
flavor: Commander of the U.S.S. Defiant, a warship that saw action against the Dominion and Borg.

name: Civil War Worf
flavor: Called to defend the Empire in the civil war, Worf set aside his Starfleet commission to fight for Gowron.

name: Mirror Regent Worf
flavor: The brutal Regent of the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance in a mirror universe.

name: Will Scarlett
flavor: Forced to fill the role of Will Scarlett in Q's Robin Hood scenario, Worf was 'not a merry man'.

name: Duchamps
flavor: After a transporter accident, Worf's image is used by a holosuite program to display Doctor Noah's henchman.

name: Colonel Worf
flavor: A respected advocate, Colonel Worf represented Kirk and McCoy at their murder trial on Qo'noS.

ship_action.name: I Didn't Bring A Bathing Suit

name: EV Suit Worf
flavor: After Hawk was assimilated, Worf stepped into action to rescue Picard and destroy the Borg Beacon.

name: Midwife Worf
flavor: During a ship-wide emergency, Worf must aid a pregnant Keiko OBrien when she suddenly goes into labor.

name: Lieutenant Commander Saru
flavor: Chief Science Officer of the U.S.S. Shenzhou.

ship_action.name: I Saw Hope In The Stars
The Light, It Is Almost Like Music

name: Mirror Saru
flavor: As a slave, the previously unnamed Kelpien attends to Captain Burnham.

name: Yeoman Rand
flavor: Assigned to the U.S.S. Enterprise, Yeoman Rand served faithfully in the Operations division.

name: Off Duty Janice Rand
flavor: In 2266, Yeoman Janice Rand had an encounter with a young boy who could not control Thasian powers.

ship_action.name: Let Me Show You What Will Happen

name: General Oh
flavor: Having learned of the Synthetics homeworld, Oh discards her starfleet guise and marshalls the Romulan fleet to eradicate them.

ship_action.name: Our Great Work Is Nearly At An End

name: The Duras Sisters
flavor: The Duras sisters prosecuted a civil war to replace Gowron as Chancellor with their nephew Toral.

name: Kilana
flavor: In command of a squad of Jem'Hadar, Kilana ordered her troops to attack Sisko's crew to rescue a wounded Founder.

name: Persis
flavor: A human augment, Persis developed a strong attachment to Arik Soong, who she viewed as her father.

name: Holodeck 3 Dr. Brahms
flavor: A holographic representation of Enterprise-D warp system designer Doctor Leah Brahms.

name: Punk Rocker
flavor: A man simply enjoying music on the bus before Spock puts an end to his unkind outbursts.

ship_action.name: Society Could Use A Little Chaos

name: B.G. Robinson
flavor: A transporter chief aboard the Enterprise-D who quickly caught the eye of Captain Okona.

name: Telek R'Mor
flavor: Conducting research near a wormhole, Telek R'Mor agreed to carry a message from the stranded U.S.S. Voyager.

name: KDF Gowron
flavor: Gowron, son of M'Rel, was one of the final two challengers to succeed K'Mpec as the Klingon Chancellor.

name: Chancellor Gowron
flavor: Gowron solidified his postion of Klingon Chancellor by defeating the Duras-led faction of a civil war.

name: Third Remata'Klan
flavor: A Third Jem'Hadar, he loyally followed Keevan's orders, even unto his death.

name: T'Mir
flavor: Part of a Vulcan science vessel that crashed on Earth, T'Mir assumed command of the survivors.

name: Pel
flavor: Pel disguised herself as a male and displayed great business acumen to fight the notion that females can't earn profit.

name: Commander Kor
flavor: Kor, son of Rynar, commanded the force occupying Organia. His conflict with Kirk helped establish the Organian peace treaty.

name: Dr. David Marcus
flavor: Son of Admiral Kirk and Doctor Carol Marcus, David died on the Genesis Planet saving Lieutenant Saavik from execution.

ship_action.name: I Would Rather Die Than Leave

name: Commander Tomalak
flavor: A Romulan Commander who confronted the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on several occasions.

ship_action.name: My Paws And Whiskers, I'll Be Late!

name: Mother L'Rell
flavor: With a secret child, she made sacrifices for his sake, and for the sake of the Klingon Empire.

name: Ensign Ogawa
flavor: Head nurse of the U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Alyssa Ogawa was essential to Doctor Crusher's medical staff.

name: Wesley Crusher
flavor: A young member of the U.S.S. Enterprise-D's crew, which he would later join as an Ensign.

name: Ensign Crusher
flavor: After passing the Starfleet Entrance Examination, Wesley Crusher was promoted to a full Ensign.

name: Acting Ensign Crusher
flavor: After befriending and assisting The Traveler, Wesley Crusher was field promoted to Acting Ensign.

name: Formal Dress Wesley Crusher
flavor: Wesley returned from his journey with the Traveller and attended the Troi-Riker wedding in 2379.

name: Cadet Wesley Crusher
flavor: Wesley Crusher was a Starfleet cadet for three years before leaving with The Traveler.

ship_action.name: What Small, Frail Creatures You Are

name: One
flavor: A fusion of Seven's nanoprobes with the Doctor's mobile emitter, was in effect a 29th century Borg.

name: Wrathful Khan
flavor: Exiled by Kirk to the doomed planet Ceti Alpha V, Khan sought revenge for Admiral Kirk's perceived neglect.

name: Young Khan
flavor: Ruler of a quarter of humanity during the Eugenics Wars, Khan escaped earth on the S.S. Botany Bay.

ship_action.name: Take Her Out For a Spin

name: Tailor Garak
flavor: Garak claims to be 'a simple tailor', but some aboard DS9 believe him to be much more than that.

name: Mirror Garak
flavor: Executive Officer of the mirror Terok Nor, Garak favored brutal discipline to maintain order.

name: Obsidian Order Garak
flavor: Reunited with his mentor Enabran Tain, Garak's first duty was to interrogate a Changeling prisoner: Odo.

name: Garak, Elim Garak
flavor: Curious as to Bashir's activities, Garak breaks into Bashir's secret agent holoprogram and joins him.

ship_action.name: You May Have Just Saved The Entire Alpha Quadrant

name: Bartender Quark
flavor: Owner of Quark's Bar, he is one of the more colorful residents of Deep Space Nine.

name: Klingon Quark
flavor: After a Klingon dies in Quark's bar, his widow Grilka takes Quark to Qo'noS.

ship_action.name: You Can't Climb A Mountain On Crumbs!

name: Richard Castillo
flavor: Helmsman of the Enterprise-C, Castillo assumed command after Captain Garrett was killed.

ship_action.name: Why Talk, When We Can Dance?

name: Writer Jake Sisko
flavor: During the Dominion occupation of Terok Nor, Jake writes articles for the Federation News Service

name: Forra Gegen
flavor: A Voth molecular paleontologist, Gegen learned that the saurian species had originally developed on Earth.

name: "The Colony" Tilly
flavor: Seeking help in the repair of their communications equipment, Tilly accompanies Saru on an away mission.

name: Kelis
flavor: Kelis, a playwright, seeks to use his plays as a way to prevent war between rival factions on his home planet.

name: Captain John Harriman
flavor: Captain of the Enterpise-B, Harriman's first mission was to rescue El-Aurian refugee ships from the Nexus.

name: Commando Crusher
flavor: As chief medical officer of the Enterprise, Doctor Crusher participated in the Celtris III raid.

name: Mok'bara Crusher
flavor: Beverly practices the Klingon art of Mokbara to meditate, and also to pry into Trois love life.

name: Caldos IV Crusher
flavor: Beverly Crusher encounters an anaphasic lifeform tied to a family heirloom.

name: Century Nurse Crusher
flavor: Traveling back to the nineteenth century to save Commander Data from Devidian lifeforms, Crusher assumes the guise of a nurse.

ship_action.name: Do you need any help, Doctor?

name: Leila Kalomi
flavor: Leila fell in love with Spock, and was happy when mind-altering spores made him return her affection. It didnt last.

name: Mobile Doctor
flavor: Equipped with a 29th Century mobile holoemitter, this EMH was no longer restricted in movement.

name: Emergency Medical Holoprogram Mk.1
flavor: The first version of the EMH program in wide distribution, Voyager's EMH is the only one still in medical use.

ship_action.name: The Back Nine at Gedi Prime?

name: T'Pring
flavor: Not quite Spocks wife and not quite his betrothed, TPring claimed kal-if-fee in order to be with Stonn instead.

name: Lieutenant Arex Na Eth
flavor: Navigator aboard the Enterprise, Arex found himself playing his lute under the influence of a love potion.

ship_action.name: Into The Heart Of The Nova

name: Comm Officer Uhura
flavor: Communications Officer for the U.S.S. Enterprise, she would later be promoted to Commander on the U.S.S. Enterprise-A.

name: Commander Uhura
flavor: Commander Uhura served under Captain Spock during the attempted theft of the Genesis Device.

name: Yarnek
flavor: Yarnek forced Enterprise crew into a battle of 'good' vs. 'evil' for the edification of the Excalbian people.

ship_action.name: My People Will Find Your Ship

name: First Maje Culluh
flavor: First Maje of the Kazon-Nistrim, Culluh succeeded in capturing U.S.S. Voyager for a short time.

ship_action.name: It Ain't Over Til It's Over

name: KDF Alexander
flavor: Joined the Rotarran as a member of the Klingon Defense Force, against his father's wishes.

ship_action.name: You Must Remember We Are With You

name: Commando Shran
flavor: An Andorian from the Imperial Guard, Shran confronted Captain Archer on the monastery of P'Jem.

name: Ransom Shran
flavor: Shran calls in a favor to rescue his daughter being held for ransom.

name: Lt. Sulu
flavor: Science Officer on the U.S.S. Enterprise, he would later rise to the rank of Captain onboard the U.S.S. Excelsior.

name: Fencing Sulu
flavor: Intoxicated by the Psi 2000 polywater, Sulu viewed himself as a musketeer onboard the U.S.S. Enterprise.

name: Captain Sulu
flavor: As captain of the U.S.S. Excelsior, Sulu defended the Khitomer peace talks from assassins.

name: Captain Kurn
flavor: Kurn, son of Mogh, joined the Officer Exchange Program to meet his long-lost brother, Worf.

name: Kevin Uxbridge
flavor: An immortal being sworn to pacifism grapples with the ramifications of his grief and rage.

ship_action.name: You dont understand the scope of my crime

name: Lt. Commander Dexter Remmick
flavor: Inhabited by a parasite, Remmick infiltrated Starfleet Command to compromise their command structure for nefarious purposes.

name: Morn
flavor: A talkative and frequent patron of Quark's Bar, Morn was often found enjoying a drink on his bar stool.

name: Vic Fontaine
flavor: A self-aware hologram, Vic runs the 'Vic's Las Vegas Lounge' holoprogram popular among the DS9 command staff.

ship_action.name: The Best Is Yet To Come
I'll See You In Hell First!

name: Miral Torres
flavor: Miral appeared on the Barge of the Dead to her daughter, B'Elanna, during a near-death vision.

ship_action.name: Do You Know Who I Am?

name: General Martok
flavor: A gifted Klingon fighter, Martok rose to the rank of General and, eventually Chancellor of the Klingon Empire.

name: 23rd Century Martok
flavor: A version of Martok from an alternate universe, born into the Klingon Empire during the twenty-third century.

ship_action.name: I will fight any battle. Anywhere

name: Shiboline M'Ress
flavor: A natural communicator, MRess worked as a relief communications officer under Captain Kirk.

name: Commander Maddox
flavor: A Starfleet cyberneticist, Bruce Maddox attempted to disassemble Data for study.

name: Captain Pike
flavor: Second captain of the Constitution-class Enterprise, Captain Pike is well known for his mission to Talos IV.

ship_action.name: This Isn't The Only Life Available

name: Boreth Pike
flavor: Looking for a source of power for the Red Angel suit, Pike seeks answers on Boreth.

name: Seven in Blue
flavor: After being severed from the Borg Collective, Seven of Nine--now called Seven--struggled to adapt.

name: Temporal Agent Seven
flavor: A crew member on the timeship Relativity, she was later replaced by Seven of Nine.

name: Seven of Nine
flavor: Despite her past, Seven of Nine proved to be a fearless officer willing to defend the U.S.S. Voyager to the death.

name: Drone Seven of Nine
flavor: When Annika Hansen was assimilated with her family, she became the Borg drone Seven of Nine.

ship_action.name: Hunt It Down And Kill It

name: Indulgent Seven
flavor: In an effort to conceal the Doctor from the Lokirrim, Seven downloads his program into her cybernetic matrix.

ship_action.name: There Won't Be A Next Time
I Didn't Want to Disillusion Him

name: Awaiting Amanda Grayson
flavor: After pleading with Spock to help his father, Sarek, Amanda anxiously waits for the procedure to be complete.

ship_action.name: Your Duty Is To Your Father

name: Laas
flavor: A Changeling who matured in the Alpha Quadrant, Laas could take a wide range of forms including a warp-capable creature.

name: Lt. Commander Jack Crusher
flavor: Part of the crew of the U.S.S. Stargazer, Lieutenant Commander Crusher was killed in an accident on an away mission.

name: Commander Tucker
flavor: Chief Engineer aboard the NX-01 Enterprise, Tucker remained a hands-on officer unafraid of a little elbow grease.

name: Mirror Tucker
flavor: Chief Engineer of the I.S.S Enterprise, Tucker was able to prevent the U.S.S. Defiant from being lost to sabotage.

name: Geskana Tucker
flavor: After helping a stranded Ship, Archer and Trip test their mettle in an alien sport.

name: Counselor Troi
flavor: Ship's counselor on the U.S.S. Enterprise-D, her empathic abilities were invaluable to the crew.

name: Rakal Troi
flavor: Disguised as Major Rakal of the Tal Shiar, Troi was tasked with helping Romulans defect to the Federation.

name: Commander Troi
flavor: Stranded on Earth in the 21st century, Troi helped convince Cochrane to take his historic flight.

name: Bridge Officer Troi
flavor: Troi received a promotion to a full commander after passing the Bridge Officer's Test.

name: Goddess of Empathy Troi
flavor: Ship's counselor Deanna Troi was envisioned as the Goddess of Empathy in a holodeck program of Reginald Barclay's.

name: Durango Troi
flavor: A fan of the 'Ancient West' since childhood, Deanna played the role of Durango in the Deadwood holoprogram.

name: Nepenthe Troi
flavor: Using her experience as both counselor and mother, Troi reaches out to Soji and advises Picard on Nepenthe.

name: Bridal Deanna Troi
flavor: Celebrating their marriage, Deanna enjoys the festivities of her human heritage with a traditional reception.

name: Vedek Winn Adami
flavor: An outspoken member of the Vedek Assembly, Winn was a prominent member of the Bajoran theology.

name: Rogue Kai Winn
flavor: Embittered by feeling overshadowed by the Emissary, Kai Winn turned to the forbidden Kosst Amojen and Pah-Wraiths.

name: Subcommander T'Pol
flavor: Assigned to the Enterprise in the 22nd century, T'Pol was essential to many of the Enterprise's missions.

name: Commander T'Pol
flavor: Promoted to the rank of Commander after joining Starfleet in 2154.

name: Mirror T'Pol
flavor: A Vulcan slave of the Terran Empire, T'Pol joins with other nonhumans in a revolt.

name: Captain T'Pol
flavor: When Archer was infected by temporal parasites, T'Pol took command of the Enterprise.

name: EV Suit T'Pol
flavor: Sub-commander TPol boards a dangerous Klingon ship as it descends into the depths of a gas giant.

name: Mr. Vup
flavor: A bodyguard for Bjayzl, Mr. Vup evaluates and considers the risk of what Rios and Picard offer.

ship_action.name: Not a Conversation Killer at All

name: Sybok
flavor: A Vulcan iconoclast, Sybok embraced emotion and sought to find the paradise planet of Sha Ka Ree.

name: Chef Neelix
flavor: Chef and morale booster for the U.S.S. Voyager, Neelix was infamous for his 'even better than coffee' substitute.

name: Commander Kang
flavor: Tricked into a confrontation with Kirk, Kang and his counterpart were forced to work together to defeat their incorporeal manipulator.

name: Zobral
flavor: Rebel Leader turned Terrorist, Zobral leads a clan against the oppressive ruling Torothan Clan on the Torothan homeworld.

name: CMO 'Bones' McCoy
flavor: Chief Medical Officer of the U.S.S. Enterprise, Leonard McCoy was a close friend of Captain Kirk.

name: Prisoner 'Bones' McCoy
flavor: Sentenced to a life of hard labor on the asteroid Rura Penthe, McCoy was rescued by Kirk and Spock.

name: "Dark Ages" McCoy
flavor: McCoy infiltrated a 1980s San Francisco hospital to rescue a gravely-wounded Chekov.

name: Drafted McCoy
flavor: Having already retired from Starfleet, Doctor McCoy was incensed to be called up during the V'ger crisis.

name: EV Suit McCoy
flavor: Donning an environmental suit and boarding the U.S.S. Defiant with his crewmates, McCoy seeks to find out what happened to its ill-fated crew.

name: Mirror McCoy
flavor: A doctor from the Mirror Universe, McCoy possesses all sorts of devices for torture and interrogation.

ship_action.name: You Don't Trust Me, Do You?

name: Zarabeth
flavor: Trapped alone five thousand years in the past, Zarabeth falls for a surprise visitor: Spock.

ship_action.name: You Have to Let Me Go

name: Mirror Doctor Culber
flavor: A high-ranking physician in the Terran Empire who supported Lorca and Burnhams attempt to usurp the throne.

name: Lady Sirella
flavor: Mistress of the House Of Martok, Lady Sirella must approve of anyone who wishes to join the house through marriage.

name: Marla McGivers
flavor: Enterprise ship's historian, Marla assisted Khan's coup and followed him into exile on Ceti Alpha V.

name: Cyrus Redblock
flavor: A holographic gangster, this Dixon Hill villain held Starfleet participants hostage during a Holodeck malfunction.

name: Kai Opaka
flavor: Spiritual leader of the Bajoran people during the Occupation, Opaka was the first to recognize Sisko as Emissary.

name: Torchbearer Rejac
flavor: Guardian of the Beacon of Kahless.

name: Interfaced Barclay
flavor: Enhanced by the Cytherians, Barclay created a neural interface to the Enterprise computer.

name: Cyrano de Barclay
flavor: In order to overcome his holodeck addiction, Barclay takes on the role of Cyrano de Bergerac before his shipmates.

ship_action.name: The Moon...Yes, That Will Be My Home

name: Kivas Fajo
flavor: A collector of rare, strange, and sometimes illegal items, Kivas Fajo faked Datas death in order to add the android into his collection.

name: 1701 Sisko
flavor: Sisko, disguised as a crewman of the original U.S.S. Enterprise, worked to prevent the assassination of Captain Kirk.

name: Mirror Sisko
flavor: A privateer who served Intendant Kira Nerys in the mirror universe, he later led the Terran Rebellion against the KCA.

name: Captain Sisko
flavor: Sisko had the heavy responsibility of leading Deep Space Nine through the Dominion War.

name: Promoted Sisko
flavor: Promoted to Captain, Benjamin Sisko was recognized for his accomplishments as Commander of Deep Space Nine.

name: Dr. Hippocrates Noah
flavor: After a transporter accident, Sisko's image is used by a holosuite program to display supervillain Hippocrates Noah.

ship_action.name: The Moment I Made The Decision
We're Not Who We Seem To Be
I Can Take Care Of Myself

name: Tuvix
flavor: Created in a transporter accident, Tuvix was ultimately separated back into Tuvok and Neelix.

ship_action.name: I'd Hate to Make Your Life Difficult
At the Tip of My Blade

name: GI Chakotay
flavor: While Voyager was under the control of the Hirogen, Chakotay was made to play the role of an Army captain.

ship_action.name: I Have A Lot To Learn

name: Mike Burnham Sr.
flavor: An undercover operative posing as a xenoanthropologist, Mike is always ready to protect his family.

name: Doctor Chaotica
flavor: Villain of the Captain Proton holonovel, Doctor Chaotica once waged war against photonic lifeforms from subspace.

name: Rogue Harry Kim
flavor: Fifteen years after losing Voyager in an attempt to get home, Harry resolved to alter the past to save the ship.

name: Prisoner Kim
flavor: Trapped in an Akritirian prison, Kim must resort to desperate measures to survive.

name: Fair Haven Harry Kim
flavor: Preparing for an evening with Maggie, Harry Kim replicates some flowers and dons a nice suit.

name: Arachnia Janeway
flavor: Queen of the Spider People in the 'Captain Proton' holonovels, Janeway assumed her role to defeat Doctor Chaotica.

name: Admiral Janeway
flavor: Within two years of successfully returning home from the Delta Quadrant, Janeway was promoted to the rank of Vice Admiral.

name: Assimilated Janeway
flavor: Captain Janeway allowed herself to be partially assimilated to deliver a nanovirus to the Borg.

ship_action.name: I Don't Respond Well To Threats

name: Polaric Janeway
flavor: After being sucked through a temporal anomaly with Lt. Paris, Janeway tries to save a planet from her teams attempt to rescue them.

name: Grilka
flavor: Grilka, head of the House of Grilka, married Quark in a gambit to keep her house upon the death of her husband.

name: Dr. Tolian Soran
flavor: A survivor of the Borg destruction of El-Auria, Soran was obsessed with returning to the Nexus.

ship_action.name: It Will Pass. You'll See. It Will Pass.

name: Borg Queen
flavor: Originally a member of Borg-designated Species 125, the Borg Queen brought order to the chaos of the hive mind.

name: Grand Nagus Zek
flavor: As Grand Nagus of the Ferengi, Zek was the head of the Ferengi government.

ship_action.name: Who I Am Today, I Will Be Forever

name: Commander Spock
flavor: First Officer onboard the U.S.S. Enterprise, Lieutenant Commander Spock would become a revered member of the Federation.

name: Recovering Spock
flavor: Recovering on Vulcan, Commander Spock spent much time retraining his logical mind.

name: Mirror Spock
flavor: First Officer of the I.S.S Enterprise, Spock was a ruthless officer in the mirror universe's Terran Empire.

name: Ambassador Spock
flavor: Ambassador Spock abuptly vanished, but appeared on Romulus assisting a Romulan-Vulcan reunification movement.

name: Kal-if-fee Spock
flavor: As a combatant in the traditional kal-if-fee contest, Spock is forced to fight Kirk to the death.

name: Talos IV Spock
flavor: Prior to serving with Captain Kirk, Spock accompanied Captain Pike on an away mission to Talos IV.

name: Laborer Spock
flavor: Constructed a mnemonic memory circuit using 'stone knives and bearskins.'

ship_action.name: Logic Is The Beginning Of Wisdom
I Am Well Able To Defeat You
Let Us See What The Future Holds

name: EV Suit Spock
flavor: Feeling a connection to the consciousness of V-ger, Spock stole equipment to seek his answers.

name: Soren
flavor: A member of the androgynous Jnaii species who later reveals she identifies as femaleis joined by Riker on a rescue mission.

name: Jhamel
flavor: A member of the Aenar subspecies, Jhamel used her telepathy to find and contact her brother through the use of a telepresence unit.

name: Admiral Nechayev
flavor: Vice Admiral Nechayev commanded Starfleet operations in the vicinity of the Cardassian Union.

ship_action.name: Somehow I thought You'd Be Taller

name: Dr. Phlox
flavor: Chief Medical Officer of the Enterprise, Phlox was a lifelong learner of every medical art.

name: Mirror Phlox
flavor: A sadistic doctor serving on board the I.S.S Enterprise, a starship from the mirror universe.

ship_action.name: I'm A Physician, Not An Engineer!

name: Nanoprobe Phlox
flavor: After being infected with Borgs Nanoprobes, Phlox needs to think more like an Engineer than a Doctor to cure his condition.

name: EV Suit Phlox
flavor: Even Phlox has to engage in regular EV suit training.

name: Armed Philippa Georgiou
flavor: Captain Georgiou to excavate a Crepusculan well that had gone dry and save the species from drought.

ship_action.name: I Thought We Had An Agreement

name: Admiral Georgiou
flavor: Aboard the Discovery, Georgiou adopts the disguise of an Admiral when under inspection by the Earth Defense Force.

ship_action.name: I Had To Make It Believable
You Are Starting To Annoy Me
Able To Hang In A Firefight A Little Longer

name: Captain Kasidy Yates
flavor: Captain of the civilian freighter 'Xhosa', Kasidy was briefly imprisoned for smuggling Maquis cargo.

name: Smuggler Kasidy Yates
flavor: Sympathetic to the Maquis, Kasidy helped Michael Eddington smuggle replicators away from the Cardassians.

ship_action.name: Let's See If You Can Beat That

name: Bride Kasidy Danielle Yates
flavor: Against the wish of the prophets, Kasidy marries Benjamin Sisko.

ship_action.name: Well, That Almost Sounds Like A Threat

name: Expedition Vash
flavor: A student of archaeology infamous for her ethically questionable practices.

name: Ensign Mendon
flavor: A Benzite, Mendon was instrumental in stopping a subatomic bacteria from destroying the Enterprise.

name: Cadet Sito Jaxa
flavor: While member of Nova Squadron, Sito Jaxa survived a flying accident that killed one of her fellow cadets.

name: Nona
flavor: Fighting for what she believes is right, Nona betrays her husband to stop her people from becoming rulers.

name: Admiral Cartwright
flavor: A Starfleet admiral, Cartwright was a conspirator in the plot to sabotage the Klingon-Federation peace summit.

name: Botanist Keiko
flavor: A botanist and head of the Enterprise plant biology lab, Keiko later opened a school on Deep Space 9.

ship_action.name: Give Life, Kill, It Is All The Same

name: Hugh
flavor: Survivor of a Borg scout cube crash, Third of Five developed the spark of individuality and became Hugh.

name: Executive Director Hugh
flavor: A former Borg drone, Hugh became Executive Director of the Borg Reclamation Project.

ship_action.name: A Poker Face Carved In Marble

name: Glinn Damar
flavor: First seen aboard the freighter Groumall, Damar served as Dukat's second-in-command across multiple assignments.

name: Revolutionary Damar
flavor: Leader of the Cardassian revolution against the Dominion, Damar was killed by Jem'hadar shortly before the final assault.

name: Commander Nevesa
flavor: Commander of a Romulan vessel, Nevesa was captured by the Enterprise crew while trying to prevent Spock's escape from her ship.

ship_action.name: Look Down Every Now And Then

name: Ensign Vorik
flavor: An engineering officer aboard Voyager, Vorik was part of the team that developed the Delta Flyer.

name: Ensign Seska
flavor: Serving on the Val Jean as a Maquis, Seska was later revealed to be a Cardassian operative disguised as a Bajoran.

name: Kazon Seska
flavor: After leaving Voyager, Seska later joined the Kazon as consort to First Maje Culluh.

name: Maquis Takeover Seska
flavor: A year after her death, Seska leaves one last surprise for the Voyager crew in an abandoned holoprogram.

name: Chief Engineer Torres
flavor: A half-Klingon Maquis officer who later joined the U.S.S. Voyager as Chief Engineer.

name: Maquis Takeover Torres
flavor: Torres, under the control of Teero Anaydis, helped lead a Maquis revolt on the U.S.S. Voyager.

ship_action.name: Brute Force Isn't Going To Do It
You Know How Much I Hate To Lose
I'm Going To Get This One

name: Section 31 Reed
flavor: Pushed into serving Section 31, Malcolm Reed investigated a secret Klingon program.

name: Tourist Reed
flavor: Looking for some company on the pleasure planet of Risa, Malcolm Reed ends up in a desperate situation.

ship_action.name: Follow Two Aliens into a Basement

name: Abraham Lincoln
flavor: A simulacrum of the late President, created by the Excalbians to examine the difference between good and evil.

name: Laneth
flavor: A subject of a genetic augmentation gone wrong, Laneth struggles to retain her Klingon heart.

name: Gul Madred
flavor: A Cardassian interrogator, Gul Madred was tasked with collecting the defensve plans for Minos Korva from Capt. Picard.

ship_action.name: That Which Is Imperfect Must Be Sterilized

name: Mirror 'Smiley' O'Brien
flavor: Leader of the Terran Rebellion, 'Smiley' O'Brien commanded the I.S.S. Defiant against the KCA.

name: Chief O'Brien
flavor: Older and wiser, Miles O'Brien would go on to finish his career as a Professor of Engineering.

name: Undercover O'Brien
flavor: Working undercover for Starfleet Intelligence, O'Brien was ordered to investigate the Orion Syndicate.

name: RAF Miles O'Brien
flavor: O'Brien and Bashir often enjoyed a holorecreation of the Battle of Britain campaign.

name: Falcon O'Brien
flavor: After a transporter accident, O'brien's image is used by Dr. Bashir's holosuite program to display an assassin.

name: Keevan
flavor: Survivor of a ship crash, Keevan ordered his Jem'Hadar to their deaths and then surrendered to Captain Sisko.

ship_action.name: I Did What I Had To

name: Sord
flavor: The Vedala recruited Sord alongside Kirk, Spock, Em/3/Green, Lara, and Tchar to retrieve the Soul of the Skorr to prevent the start of a war.

name: Technician Rom
flavor: Younger brother of Quark, Rom found success in Deep Space Nine's Engineering crew.

name: Grand Nagus Rom
flavor: Leading reform among the Ferengi, Rom was eventually elevated to the rank of Grand Nagus.

name: Niners Rom
flavor: Rom joined Sisko's baseball team, pinch hitting for the Niners against the Vulcan Logicians.

name: Berlinghoff Rasmussen
flavor: A 22nd Century 'inventor', Rasmussen posed as a historian from the future to steal from the Enterprise-D.

name: Koloth
flavor: Commander of the Klingon vessel I.K.S Gr'oth, Koloth encountered Kirk at Deep Space Station K7.

name: Ardra
flavor: A legendary devil-figure on Ventax II, a con artist impersonated her in order to take control of the planet.

ship_action.name: The Time For Diplomacy Is Past

name: Humanoid Figure
flavor: Unable to appear physically, the elusive humanoid figure attempts to manipulate affairs from the distant 28th century.

name: Commander Chekov
flavor: In order to recrystalize the HMS Bounty's dilithium crystals, Chekov harvested gamma rays from the Navy carrier U.S.S. Enterprise.

ship_action.name: We're In A Lot Of Trouble
We've Got To Get Out Of Here

name: Lt. Tasha Yar
flavor: Security Chief of the U.S.S. Enterprise-D. Later killed in action by an alien lifeform.

name: Warship Yar
flavor: Refugee of an alternate universe in which the Enterprise-C fought daily battles against the Klingon Empire.

name: Aviator Yar
flavor: Inspired by the holodeck adventures of O'Brien and Bashir, Aviator Yar was released in the Second Battle of New York event.

ship_action.name: You Are Fully Functional, Aren't You?

name: Lieutenant Saavik
flavor: A Vulcan officer assigned to the U.S.S. Enterprise, she proved herself in battle with the U.S.S. Reliant.

name: Nurse Paris
flavor: Flight Controller of the U.S.S. Voyager, he was haunted by his past in the Maquis and on the U.S.S. Exeter.

name: Captain Proton Paris
flavor: Hero from The Adventures of Captain Proton, Tom Paris regularly took on the role in the holodeck.

ship_action.name: For A Moment I Was Everywhere
Is This What You Call Enlightened?

name: Maquis Takeover Paris
flavor: Paris steps back into his Maquis identity to save Voyager from a holoprogram sabotaged by Seska.

name: Luau Paris
flavor: Paris slips into his classic Big Daddy-O Surf Special shirt before attending a luau with his crewmates.

name: Lore
flavor: Doctor Soong's first Android with a functional positronic brain. Gifted with emotions, he was Data's older 'brother.'

name: The One, Lore
flavor: After stealing an emotion chip intended for Data, Lore became the leader of a breakaway Borg ship.

name: Lursa Duras
flavor: The elder of the Duras sisters, Lursa schemed for her family to lead the Klingon Empire.

name: Crewman Tarses
flavor: A Romulan-Human member of Starfleet who was assigned to the U.S.S. Enterprise-D.

name: Idrin
flavor: Commander of a Hirogen hunting ship, Idrin captured Tuvok and Seven of Nine.

name: Admiral Kirsten Clancy
flavor: Fleet Admiral and Commander in Chief of Starfleet at the end of the twenty-fourth century.

name: Commander Sela
flavor: Daughter of Tasha Yar and a Romulan officer, Sela worked to destabilize the Federation.

name: Emory Erickson
flavor: Under false pretenses, Erickson sought to use his invention of the molecular transporter to save his son trapped in sub-space.

ship_action.name: Youll Be Able To Leave The Lights On

name: Dr. Soong
flavor: A cyberneticist who created the androids Data and Lore, among others.

name: Judge Q
flavor: All-powerful judge and jury, Q placed the Enterprise-D's crew on trial at Farpoint.

name: Human Q
flavor: After being stripped of his powers by the Q Continuum, Q sought refuge on the Enterprise-D.

name: Sheriff of Nottingham Q
flavor: During his Robin Hood simulation, Q played the role of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

ship_action.name: All It Takes Are A Few Good Men!

name: Lothario Q
flavor: Of all the females, of all the species, in all the galaxyQ drops in to inform Janeway of his plans of becoming a parent.

name: Stargazer Picard
flavor: Commanding officer of the U.S.S. Stargazer, where he first served as its flight controller.

name: Enterprise-D Picard
flavor: Captain of the legendary U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Captain Picard was key to many of the Federation's successes.

name: Locutus of Borg
flavor: Captured by the Borg, Locutus was the name given to an assimilated Jean-Luc Picard.

name: Enterprise-E Picard
flavor: Crashed on 21st century Earth, Captain Picard found himself up against the implacable Borg Queen.

name: Tommy Gun Dixon
flavor: During the attempted assimilation of the Enterprise-E, Picard dispatched a Borg drone with holographic bullets.

name: Galen
flavor: Picard assumed the role of the smuggler Galen after being captured by raiders searching for a Vulcan psionic weapon.

name: Detective Dixon Hill
flavor: In his spare time, Picard enjoyed participating in the Dixon Hill collection of holonovels."

name: C.O.P. Founder Picard
flavor: Stepping in for the missing Jonathan Archer, Picard helped form the Coalition of Planets. (Second Battle of New York player vote winner!)

name: Smitten Jean-Luc Picard
flavor: Picard played the role of Lwaxana's jealous lover in a ploy to rescue her from Daimon Tog.

ship_action.name: Darmok And Jalad On The Ocean

name: Kamin Picard
flavor: Influenced by a Kataan probe, Picard assumes the identity of an ironweaver named Kamin

name: Vashti Picard
flavor: Before heading to Freecloud to look for Bruce Maddox, Picard visits the Romulan Relocation hub on Vashti to enlist aid.

name: Ensign Sato
flavor: Comm Officer onboard the Enterprise, Hoshi Sato's experiences led her to create a universal linguacode.

name: Mirror Empress Sato
flavor: After taking over the Defiant in the mirror universe, Sato proclaimed herself Empress of the Terran Empire.

ship_action.name: I Die Not For Myself But For You

name: Chief Engineer La Forge
flavor: Chief Engineer of the Enterprise-D, Geordi La Forge was an important and gifted member of the crew.

name: Lt. Commander La Forge
flavor: After tangling with the Borg, Geordi found himself and the Enterprise-E back in 2063.

name: Captain La Forge
flavor: Captain of the U.S.S. Challenger, Geordi tried to prevent Kim and Chakotay from changing the past to save Voyager.

name: General Chang
flavor: Chief of Staff to Chancellor Gorkon, Chang conspired to bring about a Klingon-Federation war.

name: Booker and Grudge
flavor: Booker is a courier who makes deliveries and smuggling goods in order to get enough dilithium to keep going with his queen, Grudge.

name: Phoenix Cochrane
flavor: Developer of the first human warp drive, Zefram Cochrane was the target of a Borg attack in 2063.

name: Lt. Commander Scott
flavor: An ingenious engineer of Scottish descent who never failed to pull Captain Kirk and the U.S.S. Enterprise out of danger.

name: Captain Scott
flavor: Trapped in a transporter buffer for 75 years, Captain Scott was later rescued by the U.S.S. Enterprise-D.

name: Professor Scott
flavor: Posing as 'Professor' Scott, he helped build a tank to transport humpback whales to the 23rd century.

name: Weyoun Clone 4
flavor: A Vorta clone who oversaw a Jem'Hadar attack ship. Later killed after eradicating a Jem'Hadar rebellion.

name: Lon Suder
flavor: A Betazoid member of the Maquis, Suder successfully channeled his violent tendencies to help retake Voyager from the Kazon.

name: Ensign Mayweather
flavor: Helmsman of the NX-01 Enterprise, Travis Mayweather would explore new worlds alongside Captain Archer.

name: Boomer Mayweather
flavor: Travis Mayweather was one of the first 'space boomers,' a person born in space.

name: Tuskegee Mayweather
flavor: Inspired by the holodeck adventures of O'Brien and Bashir, Tuskegee Mayweather was released in the Second Battle of New York event.

ship_action.name: If It's Easy What's The Point?

name: Tactical MACO Mayweather
flavor: After joining as Archers personal bodyguard, Mayweather decides to defy orders from Admiral Forrest in favor of Archer.

name: Alicia Travers
flavor: A member of the resistance in New York. Alicia helps Archer liberate her city and restore the 20th century timeline.

name: Luther Sloan
flavor: An operative in the Section 31 intelligence agency, he frequently sparred with Julian Bashir.

name: Logician Solok
flavor: In order to instigate a negative emotional response, Solok uses the sport of baseball to try and embarrass Sisko.

ship_action.name: I Fail to See Why You Are Celebrating

name: Captain Solok
flavor: When reuniting with an old colleague, Captain Solok seeks to repair his ship and provoke an emotional response through competition.

name: Vedek Bareil Antos
flavor: A moderate member of the Vedek Assembly, Bareil stood againt Winn in the election of the new Kai.

name: Ilia Probe
flavor: Originally a crew member of the Enterprise-A, Ilia was destroyed and recreated as a probe by the entity V'Ger.

name: First Goran'Agar
flavor: Survivor of a crash landing, Goran'Agar was found to naturally produce the drug ketracel-white.

name: Mirror Archer
flavor: First Officer of the 22nd century I.S.S Enterprise, Archer stole the U.S.S. Defiant from the Tholians.

ship_action.name: Luck Had Nothing To Do With It

name: Riley Frazier
flavor: Once science officer of the U.S.S. Roosevelt, Riley was assimilated during the Battle of Wolf 359.

name: Dr. Richard Daystrom
flavor: One of Earth's great scientists, Doctor Daystrom developed the M-5 computer to automate starship operations.

name: Reclamation Narissa
flavor: A Zhat Vash agent in charge of gaining information at the Borg Reclamation project.

name: Changeling Founder
flavor: One of many Founders, this changeling commanded all Dominion activity in the Alpha Quadrant.

ship_action.name: I Wish You Hadn't Done That
I Am The Very Model Of A Modern Major General

name: Crell Moset
flavor: Revived as a simulation named 'Medical Consultant Program Beta One,' Moset was a brilliant and unethical scientist.

name: Commander Kruge
flavor: Skipper of a bird-of-prey, Commander Kruge sought to weaponize the Genesis device for the Klingons.

ship_action.name: All The Time In The World!

name: Gray
flavor: Now a part of Adira, Gray supports them unseen.

name: Deral
flavor: On Meridian, which shifts between a corporeal and non-corporeal state every sixty years, Deral looks for a way to keep his planet on this plane.

ship_action.name: This Isn't Turning Out Exactly The Way I Planned...

name: Sahil
flavor: After forty years of dutiful isolation, Sahil is commissioned as a Federation communications officer.

ship_action.name: It Would Be My Honor to Assist You

name: Wyatt Earp
flavor: Created by the Melkot to punish a trespassing party of the Enterprise, this replica of a wild west icon believes Kirk, Spock, Bones, Scotty, and Chekov to be members of the Clanton gang.

name: Dr. Carol Marcus
flavor: Principal scientist on Project Genesis, Doctor Marcus pursued a dream of bringing life from lifelessness.

name: Commander Barak
flavor: Captain of the K'tinga-class I.K.S Amar, Barak and his ship were destroyed by V'ger.

ship_action.name: I Can Fix Stuff With Duct Tape

name: Flustered Jett Reno
flavor: Muddled with visions of the future, a flustered Jett Reno hurries to deliver the Time Crystal.

name: Adira Tal
flavor: Adira, now properly joined with the Trill Symbiont Tal, re-acquires their memories from their previous lives.

name: Enabran Tain
flavor: Former head of the Obsidian Order, Enabran Tain organized a sneak attack against the Founder homeworld.

name: Mirror Jennifer Sisko
flavor: A scientist for the KCA, Jennifer was recruited by the Terran Rebellion by prime universe Ben Sisko.

name: Jennifer Sisko
flavor: Jennifer may be gone, but she is still a part of Bens existence.

name: Senator Cretak
flavor: Romulan senator and representative on Deep Space 9, Cretak was the victim of a Section 31 plot keep her from power.

ship_action.name: I Am Trying To Save You

name: First Officer Burnham
flavor: A Starfleet commander, Michael Burnham was the first officer of the U.S.S. Shenzhou.

ship_action.name: I'm Not Staying To Make Friends
The Old Michael Burnham is Dead

name: Courier Burnham
flavor: Joining up with Booker, Burnham helps as a courier while she awaits the return of Discovery.

name: Klingon K'Ehleyr
flavor: About to embark on a mission to re-integrate Klingons from a time of war, KEhleyr professes her feelings for Worf.

name: Resistance Shakaar
flavor: A part of the resistance during the Cardassian Occupation, Shakaar was later First Minister of Bajor.

name: Teenager Nog
flavor: Son of Rom and Prinadora, Nog was a waiter for his uncle at Quark's Bar on Deep Space Nine.

name: Cadet Nog
flavor: Nog became the first Ferengi member of Starfleet, and was assigned to DS9 as part of his cadet field studies.

name: CMO Bashir
flavor: Second in his class at Starfleet Medical, Bashir chose to do 'frontier medicine' at Deep Space Nine.

name: Bashir, Julian Bashir
flavor: Bashir played the role of a secret agent in a recreational holosuite program.

name: Changeling Bashir
flavor: A Changeling infiltrator replaced Bashir and attempted to destroy the Bajoran sun.

name: RAF Julian Bashir
flavor: Bashir and O'Brien often enjoyed a holorecreation of the Battle of Britain campaign.

ship_action.name: This Is Where Heroes Are Made
I'm a Doctor, Not a Historian

name: Heist Bashir
flavor: Bashir doctors the guards drink with ipecac to allow the heist to be successful.

ship_action.name: And I slip Ipecac into Howards Drink

name: Commander Kelby
flavor: An engineering officer aboard the NX-01 Enterprise, Kelby briefly held the position of Chief Engineer.

ship_action.name: We Are A Long Way From Home

name: Courier Zareh
flavor: A courier in the 32nd Century, Zareh cruelly exploited The Colony as its only mercantile connection to the galaxy.

ship_action.name: All That Matters Now Is Dilithium
This Is An Act Of Mercy

name: Mirror Kirk
flavor: Captain of the Terran Empire's I.S.S Enterprise, Kirk's use of the Tantalus Device allowed him to eliminate rivals.

name: Kal-if-fee Kirk
flavor: Chosen as champion by Spock's betrothed, T'Pring, Kirk is forced to fight his friend to the 'death'.

name: Romulan Kirk
flavor: Kirk masqueraded as a Romulan in order to steal a cloaking device for Starfleet to study.

name: Admiral Kirk
flavor: After the conclusion of his five-year mission, Kirk was promoted to the rank of rear admiral.

name: Rura Penthe Kirk
flavor: Convicted of the murder of Chancellor Gorkon, Kirk was sent to Rura Penthe, the 'Alien's Graveyard'.

ship_action.name: Plans To The McKinley Rocket Base
How Are The Stone Knives And Bearskins?

name: Dr. Reyga
flavor: A brilliant Ferengi scientist, Doctor Reyga invented the metaphasic shield before his death.

ship_action.name: You Can Make A Difference Here

name: Lt. Jadzia Dax
flavor: Science Officer of Deep Space 9, Jadzia is the latest in a line of Dax symbiont hosts.

name: 1701 Jadzia Dax
flavor: Transported to the past via the Orb of Time, Jadzia stopped a Klingon attempt on Kirk's life.

name: Sniper Ezri Dax
flavor: Using a modified TR-116 rifle, Ezri Dax fought a sniper's duel with Lieutenant Chu'lak on Deep Space 9.

name: Blood Oath Jadzia Dax
flavor: Honoring an oath made by Curzon, Jadzia avenged the sons of Kang, Koloth, and Kor.

name: Klingon Bride Jadzia
flavor: Jadzia chose traditional Klingon wedding attire for her marriage to Lieutenant Commander Worf.

name: Princess Jadzia
flavor: In an attempt to entertain Major Kira, Jadzia arranged a visit to a Camelot holoprogram.

ship_action.name: It's about time you came back
We Have to Find My Friends

name: Salia
flavor: Born to parents of rival factions, Salia is destined to unite her people as a neutral ruler.

ship_action.name: Let's Not Say Goodbye Like This

name: Ambassador Sarek
flavor: Ambassador of Vulcan, he was the father of Spock.

name: Dignitary Sarek
flavor: Hiding his heart affliction, Sarek stands tall against a particularly tenacious Tellarite.

ship_action.name: Halt In The Name of Chaotica!

name: Kahless the Unforgettable
flavor: Cloned in labs in the Boreth monastery, Kahless was the rightful heir to the crown of the Klingon Empire.

name: CMO Pulaski
flavor: Chief Medical Officer for the U.S.S. Enterprise-D in 2365, she also served on the U.S.S. Repulse.

name: Groundskeeper Boothby
flavor: Groundskeeper of Starfleet Academy for decades, Boothby's advice was sought by generations of cadets.

ship_action.name: We've Got The Real McCoy Here.
We Take Our Politics Very Seriously

name: Klingon Dukat
flavor: After capturing a Klingon vessel, Dukat and his crew continued the Cardassian war against the Klingons on their own.

name: Dominion Dukat
flavor: As leader of Cardassia, Dukat delivered on his promise to retake Deep Space Nine from the Federation.

name: Pah-wraith Cult Dukat
flavor: Dukat founded the Cult of the Pah-Wraiths on the abandoned Cardassian station Empok Nor.

name: Breen Disguise Dukat
flavor: Breen Disguise Dukat

name: First Maje Haron
flavor: Leader of the Kazon-Relora sect, Haron was killed when Maje Culluh beamed him into space.

name: Gorn Captain
flavor: Leader of the attack on Cestus III, the Gorn captain was made to fight Kirk by the Metrons.

name: Kurak
flavor: An expert in warp field theory, Kurak attended Doctor Reyga's metaphasic shield test aboard the Enterprise-D.

name: Lieutenant Valeris
flavor: Spock's intended successor, Lieutenant Valeris provided Kirk's logs to be used against him at trial.

ship_action.name: Everything I Said Was The Truth!

name: Facer Rios
flavor: Posing as a facer on Freecloud, Rios introduces a disguised Picard to Bjayzls associate Mr. Vup in order to rescue Maddox.

name: T'Kuvma
flavor: T'Kuvma sought to unify the fractious Klingon Empire against the Federation.

name: Gary Seven
flavor: A Class 1 Supervisor, Gary Seven spent his life on an alien world training for the day he would return to save Earth.

name: Lt. Commander Raffaela Musiker
flavor: Lt. Commander Raffis determination to see the Romulan evacuation through ultimately cost her her post.

ship_action.name: I Am Not Afraid, Just Very Tired
When Are You Going To Do Something Interesting?

name: Technician Fisher
flavor: A geologist and senior science officer who served under both Pike and Kirk aboard the Enterprise.

ship_action.name: Do You Remember Anything At All?
I'm Stuck Here With You Mortals

name: Ambassador V'Lar
flavor: Ambassador VLar uses her trip aboard the Enterprise to expose the Mazarites.

ship_action.name: We've Kept Many Things From Them

name: Gilora Rejal
flavor: As part of the Cardassian Science Ministry, Gilora Rejal helped design a subspace relay in the Gamma Quadrant.

name: Carlos Data
flavor: Lieutenant Data takes on the role of Carlos in one of Picards Dixon Hill holonovels.

ship_action.name: It Was Better When We Were Separate

name: Captain Dathon
flavor: Picard and Dathon at El-Adrel.

name: The Professor
flavor: Built by the Enterprise's computer, The Professor was built to be Detective Data's ultimate challenge.

name: Enterprise Pike
flavor: Pike resumes his tenure as Captain of the Enterprise, despite knowing where his career will lead him

ship_action.name: The Future Is What We Make It

name: Kiley Pike
flavor: Pike goes undercover on Kiley 279 to avert a nuclear conflict that should never have been made possible in the first place

name: Chef Pike
flavor: Intelligent, charismatic, handsome, and now he cooks?!! Is there anything Pike cant do!?

ship_action.name: Sometimes Things Go So Badly, You Just Have to Laugh

name: Amand Rauth Pike
flavor: Amand Rauths deferential demeanor was a thin veil for a truly treacherous nature that even Captain Pikes charisma couldnt hide.

name: Admiral Pike
flavor: Pike ends up in an alternate timeline where he escaped injury and became an admiral. But is it worth the sacrifices of millions of people and his loved ones?

name: Tekeny Ghemor
flavor: A legate in the Cardassian Central Command. Ghemor is secretly involved in the Cardassian Dissident movement and is willing to risk his cover to protect Kira.

ship_action.name: I Won't Let Them Hurt You

name: AGIMUS
flavor: AGIMUS has a knack for sowing discord in order to upload himself into position of power.

ship_action.name: You Are Too Late, AGIMUS Reigns!

name: Displaced Molly O'Brien
flavor: Molly is rescued from a temporal portal and returned to Deep Space Nine, but only after ten years passed for her on an uninhabited planet.

name: Dr. T'Ana
flavor: The CMO of USS Cerritos. She has a dry wit and terse bedside manner, but is a trusted doctor to the crew.

name: Bankrobber T'Ana
flavor: T'Ana and Shaxs roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

ship_action.name: Hands Up Where I Can See Them!

name: Balok
flavor: Captain of the Fesarius, Balok manned his advanced ship alone. He used a puppet to intimidate and deceive potential threats due to his diminutive appearance.

name: Doctor Kovich
flavor: Kovichs insight and experience make him a valuable resource to the Federation and the Discovery crew.

ship_action.name: Guess I'm a Man of Widely Varied Interests

name: EV Suit Picard
flavor: Picard, Worf, and Hawk cross the exterior hull of the Enterprise on foot to manually disengage the Borg beacon.

name: Captain Picard Day Picard
flavor: For a school holiday to celebrate the ships captain, a reluctant Picard must pick winners from students art projects.

name: Resigned Picard
flavor: Picard resigns in protest when Starfleet halts the Romulan evacuation plan following the synth attack on Mars.

name: Fencing Picard
flavor: Picard's long-standing hobby allows you not only to keep yourself in shape, but also to rest your soul.

ship_action.name: Nothing Works Just as You Hoped

name: 2024 Picard
flavor: Picard finds himself racing to undo a nightmarish future.

name: Lt. JG Picard
flavor: Offered a choice on an alternate path from his past, Picard sees how a particular moment defined his Starfleet career.

ship_action.name: I Believe That I Can Do More

name: Disguised Tom Paris
flavor: An aficionado of all things 20th century, Tom Paris still struggled to fit in amid people on Earth in 1996.

ship_action.name: Is It So Unusual To Care About Something More?

name: Esteemed Tom Paris
flavor: Its not every day an esteemed member of the Voy visits the USS Cerritos, but when one does, Boimler is there to drool all over him.

ship_action.name: This Is How we kick A## In The Delta Quadrant

name: Prisoner Paris
flavor: While serving time for working with the Maquis, Tom Paris was recruited by Janeway to locate the Val Jean in exchange for his freedom.

ship_action.name: I'm Already Doing a Job For The Federation

name: Kevin Mulkahey
flavor: In one of Sisko's visions, Mulkahey was a plainclothes police officer in 1950s New York who abused his power to harass Benny Russell.

name: Party Tilly
flavor: Letting loose at a party on Discovery, Tilly enjoys herself while giving Burnham a few pointers and some unsolicited romantic advice.

name: Acting Captain Tilly
flavor: Tillys plan to build a bomb makes for some hard choices as oxygen runs low on Discovery.

name: Wonderland Tilly
flavor: Tilly knows she has a lot to learn, but shes determined to become a Captain someday.

ship_action.name: Im gonna be a captain someday

name: Science Officer Tilly
flavor: As the Discovery finds its new place in the 32nd century, Tilly finds hers in the role of Science Officer aboard the ship.

name: Daring Tilly
flavor: Along with Adira, Tilly leads a training mission for cadets. Overcoming the obstacles they face leads Tilly to make an important choice.

ship_action.name: This Is Real. This Is Happening.

name: Princess Tonia Barrows
flavor: During her time with McCoy on shore leave, Barrows thinks of wearing a fairy-tale princess dress which somehow instantly materializes.

ship_action.name: A Princess of the Blood Royale

name: Yeoman Barrows
flavor: Yeoman Barrows was one of the members of a group that became trapped on the shore leave planet.

ship_action.name: It Is Beautiful. So Lovely, And Restful

name: Crashed Tuvok
flavor: After crashing on a moon, Tuvok attempts to care for a trio of stranded and frightened children while repairing his shuttle.

name: Mirror Tuvok
flavor: In the Mirror Universe, Tuvok was a member of the Terran Rebellion, and used his species inherent logic to fight the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance.

ship_action.name: Logic Dictates Caution In The Face Of A Superior Enemy

name: Qowat Milat G. Burnham
flavor: Finding herself back on Essof IV, Gabrielle joins the Qowat Milat order after they healed her. She serves as Michael Burnhams shalankhkai before the Quorum.

name: Angel Gabrielle Burnham
flavor: Gabrielle evades the Klingon attack using the Red Angel suit, only to find out she is now stuck in the future timeline.

ship_action.name: Time Is Not On Our Side

name: Mestral
flavor: A Vulcan who was so fascinated with humans that he would risk his life for them. Ultimately he chose to live among them.

ship_action.name: I'm Willing To Take the Risk.

name: Krem
flavor: Krem is not the smartest of the pirate crew, and his Ferengi lobes dont help when it comes to Archer's manipulation tactics.

ship_action.name: I Don't The Have Lobes For Business

name: Mot
flavor: A Bolian barber who works aboard the USS Enterprise. His tactical advice has come in handy more than once.

name: Damron
flavor: Damron was a Xindi-Reptilian scientist responsible for the development of a bio-weapon to destroy humanity.

name: Camping Archer and Porthos
flavor: Archer takes Porthos on a research mission to a class M planet later known as Archer IV.

ship_action.name: Going Where No Dog Has Gone Before

name: Twilight Archer
flavor: The anterograde amnesia from a parasitic infection leaves him confused and unable to serve as captain.

name: Carpenter Street Archer
flavor: Archer and TPol end up in 2004 Detroit and must stop the Xindi Reptilians.

ship_action.name: Try to Stay Out of Trouble

name: Federation President Archer
flavor: After years of service in Starfleet and the Federation Council, Archer was elected President of the Federation, a post he held for 8 years.

name: First Flight Archer
flavor: Archer steals the NX-Beta, intent on proving the capability of his fathers warp engine and ensuring the NX Project proceeds.

ship_action.name: Sherlock Holmes Has Nothing On You

name: Zero Hour Archer
flavor: Archer defeats Dolim and blows up the reactor to destroy the Xindi Superweapon once and for all.

name: Carl, Guardian of Forever
flavor: Carl, a new visual representation of the Guardian, stands guard over a trans-dimensional door in the thirty-second Century.

ship_action.name: There's More Than One Way to Die.

name: Barry Waddle
flavor: A Klingon Intelligence Operative disguised as a Human merchant, Barry was trapped on Cardassia Prime during the Klingon-Cardassian War.

name: Arne Darvin
flavor: A disguised Klingon agent whose plans to poison a grain shipment were foiled by Kirk and some furballs.

name: Explorer Cutler
flavor: An entomologist, Cutler's expertise was in high demand on the surface of the planet that would become Archer IV.

ship_action.name: Thanks For Choosing Me For This Mission

name: Phased Boimler
flavor: Boimler was helping Rutherford with a transporter experiment and ended up phased after an accident.

name: USS Titan Bradward Boimler
flavor: Boimler joins the crew of the USS Titan, where he is promoted to lieutenant junior grade.

ship_action.name: I Dont Have To Write That Down

name: Ensign Boimler
flavor: Bradward Boimler is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. He is desperate to prove himself a competent and valuable member of the crew.

name: Cowpoke Boimler
flavor: Brad Boimler is the rootin'est tootin'est cowpoke around. If he wants to be sheriff someday, he'll have to get used to the itchy chaps.

ship_action.name: This Holodeck Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us

name: Fanboy Boimler
flavor: Get your Voy Collectors Plate ready cause Captain Proton and the creator of Fair Haven, Lt. Tom Paris, will be visiting the Cerritos!

ship_action.name: Fine, You Want to Play It That Way?

name: EV Suit Boimler
flavor: Boimler is on a satellite repair mission making himself useful and enjoying the view while he still has the opportunity.

name: Borg Baby Boimler
flavor: Wanting to get the maximum score for the drill, Boimler passed it over and over again, each time saving more and more Borg babies.

name: Excretus of Borg
flavor: Boimler finds himself completely assimilated by the Borg during a holoprogram drill. And all he wanted was just to get a perfect score.

name: Mirror Boimler
flavor: During Mariners drill, Terran Boimler exposed her when she greeted him with her left hand.

ship_action.name: Did You Just Salute Me With Your Left Hand?

name: Insider Ro
flavor: Ro was recruited by Starfleet Intelligence, where she underwent intensive rehabilitation.

ship_action.name: Blind Faith In Any Institution Does Not Make One Honorable

name: Mournful Elnor
flavor: Elnor grieves for Picard, someone who has played such a vital role in his life.

name: Qalankhkai Elnor
flavor: After reuniting, Elnor takes up Picards lost cause per his Qowat Milat training.

name: Profiteer Vash
flavor: Vash looks to make a quick profit by partnering with Quark to hold an auction on Deep Space Nine.

name: La'an Noonien Singh
flavor: La'an Noonien Singh was the chief of security on the USS Enterprise. She endeavored to keep the shadows of her past locked away.

ship_action.name: Not Believing You're Gonna Die Is What Gets You Killed

name: Lieutenant Ogawa
flavor: During the Borg attack, Ogawa helped evacuate casualties from the Enterprise-E infirmary.

name: Patar
flavor: Patar believed that turning control over decision-making to artificial intelligence would help avoid threats in the future.

name: Flint
flavor: Six thousand years and several aliases have brought Flint several lifetimes worth of experience - and ambition.

name: Assimilated Rooney
flavor: Researcher of the Arctic Archaeological Group. Was assimilated by the Borg and became a Borg drone.

name: Captain Carol Freeman
flavor: Captain of the Cerritos, Freeman has a flair for the dramatic, extensive second contact experience, and no time for Mariners shenanigans.

name: Disguised Daniels
flavor: Posing as a steward, Daniels blended in with the USS Enterprise crew in order to capture Silik.

ship_action.name: I Think My Bunkmate Majored In Chaos Theory

name: Lt. JG Sam Lavelle
flavor: A career-oriented and driven officer, Lavelle was highly motivated to take steps to realize what he wants: a promotion.

name: Captain Sonya Gomez
flavor: Being an attentive and insightful captain, Gomez, together with the crew of the Cerritos, successfully completes the first contact mission.

ship_action.name: Take Us In, Nice And Slow

name: Lt. Commander Ron Docent
flavor: His work on the U.S.S. Vancouver has left him exhausted from all the epic adventures. Now he just wants a simpler life on a smaller ship.

ship_action.name: Do I Need To Remind You Who My Grandmas Neighbor Was?

name: Lara
flavor: Chosen for the mission to discover the stolen Soul of the Skorr, Lara was a hunter who was well-known for her flawless directional sense.

name: Desert Ben Sisko
flavor: Guided by a vision from the prophets, Sisko scours Tyree for the Orb of the Emissary.

ship_action.name: I Know Its Out There Someplace

name: Kal'Hyah Sisko
flavor: As Dax struggles with Klingon tradition, Sisko reminds his old friend what she must do and why she is doing it.

name: Sisko, The Emissary
flavor: With the Pah-Wraiths sealed away, The Sisko ascended to the Celestial Temple with The Prophets to continue his work outside time.

name: Joran Sisko
flavor: Commander Sisko risks his safety to take on the memories of the murderous musician Joran.

ship_action.name: Do You Think of Me When You Play?

name: Night Writing Benny Russell
flavor: Inspired after meeting a prophetic preacher, Benny Russell writes the story of Captain Sisko late into the night.

name: Chuft-Captain
flavor: Chuft-Captain commanded the Kzinti forces of The Traitors Claw in an ill-fated attempt to gain relics of war from Slaver stasis boxes.

ship_action.name: You Are Meat for Our Tables

name: Brunt, F.C.A.
flavor: Liquidator Brunt of the Ferengi Commerce Authority is often called in to handle any suspect behavior from Quark and his family.

name: U.S.S. Cabot Janitor
flavor: An officer aboard the U.S.S Cabot was given the unfortunate task of cleaning up Larkins modified Tribbles.

name: All-in Owosekun
flavor: Owosekun was picked for this mission because of her raw determination to act, which she shows again in the fighting ring with a knockout.

name: Pernaia Prime T'Pol
flavor: Accompanied by Archer and Travis Mayweather, TPol heads to Pernaia Prime to hunt down the Vulcan fugitive, Menos.

name: Carpenter Street T'Pol
flavor: Along with Archer, T'Pol goes back to 21st century Detroit to stop the Xindi-Reptilians.

name: Meditative T'Pol
flavor: TPol teaches Trip various neuro-pressure techniques to help with his stress and insomnia.

ship_action.name: The Risk of Paralysis is Minimal

name: Li Nalas
flavor: The leader of one of Bajor's many resistance cells during the Cardassian Occupation of Bajor

ship_action.name: Is there Any Way I Can Help?

name: Bajoran Culber
flavor: A malfunctioning holoprogram aboard the wreckage of the KSF Khi'eth made Culber appear Bajoran.

name: Confidant Culber
flavor: CMO and a shoulder to lean on for the Discovery crew, who does not leave scientific research to help Gray.

name: Crosis
flavor: An uncharacteristically individualistic Borg drone. Aboard the Enterprise, Crosis seeks to lure Data to Lore's side.

name: Insubordinate Mariner
flavor: Mariner only sees the rules as suggestions, most of which she doesnt follow.

name: Bat'leth Mariner
flavor: Overindulging on Romulan ale, Mariner gets carried away with a batleth.

name: Ensign Mariner
flavor: Beckett Mariner is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. She breaks dumb rules that shouldnt be there so she can do a better job!

name: EV Suit Mariner
flavor: Mariner breaks protocol by using magnetic boots a little too often, which explains why the Cerritos forgot her on a satellite in space.

name: Vindicta Mariner
flavor: Captain of the Vinpocalypse, marauder Vindicta is determined to take down Captain Freeman at any cost--preferably on a rickety catwalk.

name: Deep Space Nine Mariner
flavor: From blackmailing Quark to breaking Worfs mek'leth, what other adventures did Mariner have aboard Deep Space Nine?

ship_action.name: Man! Its Like a New Thing Every Week With Those Guys!

name: Mirror Mariner
flavor: During a training drill, Mariner must take the place of her mirror universe counterpart. Unfortunately, Mariner is outed by Mirror Boimler.

ship_action.name: Seriously, Why Is This Drill Still Going?!

name: Wanted Mariner
flavor: During the drill, Mariner tries on the role of the wanted captain of the three-man away group.

name: Rock'n'Roll Mariner
flavor: Mariner played a heavy metal song so inspired and loud that even a nearby Klingon ship could appreciate it.

name: Exoarchaeologist Mariner
flavor: In an attempt to find herself, Mariner is transferred to the Independent Archaeologist Guilds. However, despite her adventures to save the Golden Idol, she realizes that she misses Starfleet.

ship_action.name: How Many Old Brown Pots Do We Really Need?

name: Esteemed Curzon Dax
flavor: Seventh host of the Dax symbiont, a close friend and mentor of Sisko, and an excellent diplomat.

ship_action.name: Aren't You Happy To See Me?

name: Yedrin Dax
flavor: Yedrin is a descendant of Jadzia and current host of the Dax symbiont, who also bears the guilt of his ancestor's mistake.

ship_action.name: What are you going to do about it?

name: Returning Ezri Dax
flavor: Ezri never imagined that visiting her family would result in her brother's imprisonment. Another victim of her mother's high expectations.

ship_action.name: I Should Have Gone Home a Long Time Ago.

name: Symbiont Pool Jadzia
flavor: Horrible visions tormented Jadzia's mind until she reconnected with Joran at the Symbiont Pools. He was a part of her, after all.

ship_action.name: You Are a Part of Me.

name: Verad Dax
flavor: Verad wanted to be joined so desperately that he could not accept the Commission's refusal and decided to steal Dax from Jadzia.

ship_action.name: I Don't Want Your Advice. I Want To Be Awake.

name: Darlene Kursky
flavor: Darlene Kursky was a secretary at Incredible Stories. She was fond of science fiction, and Bennys story delighted her.

name: Ensign Hoya
flavor: A Benzite ensign, Hoya died during a mission to Torga IV in the Gamma Quadrant.

name: Bionic 5 Rutherford
flavor: Rutherford is cast in Mariners holonovel Crisis Point as Vindictas cyborg henchman, Bionic 5.

ship_action.name: Tremble At The Sight Of The Great Vindicta!

name: Ensign Rutherford
flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

name: EV Suit Rutherford
flavor: Rutherford uses his custom holodeck program to help Tendi learn how to spacewalk. Lessons were learned.

name: Chief Engineer Rutherford
flavor: During a drill, Rutherfords attempt at an iconic heroic sacrifice is foiled by the mundane reality of pain.

ship_action.name: I Have To, Son. I Am Chief Engineer.

name: Cadet Rutherford
flavor: Rutherford wasnt always so earnest. As a cadet, he broke rules and caused chaos. But could there be a sinister cause behind his change?

name: Platonian Chapel
flavor: Chapel was beamed down and under the control of the Platonians until the kironide kicked in.

name: Civilian Exchange Chapel
flavor: Nurse Chapel is on civilian exchange from the Stanford Morehouse Epigenetic Project under Doctor MBenga.

name: Date Night Chapel
flavor: When it comes to relationship advice, Christine Chapel is the friend you need. This doesnt mean shes good at her own relationships.

name: Lady Audrey Chapel
flavor: In the role of Lady Audrey, Chapel becomes a spiritual healer, able to feel the pain of others.

name: Borg Queen Seven
flavor: Seven of Nine goes to extreme measures to protect Picard and Soji by becoming The Artifacts queen.

name: Seven In Command
flavor: Thanks to her knowledge of the Borg, Seven takes the captain's chair of the Stargazer and leads the field mission.

name: Chancellor K'mpec
flavor: K'mpec was the Klingon Chancellor, ready for anything to keep peace in the Klingon Empire.

ship_action.name: The Empire Will Not Be Destroyed

name: Rumpelstiltskin
flavor: Fairy-tale character who appeared on the ship to observe the unique phenomenon of imagination.

name: Solkar
flavor: The first (officially recorded) contact between Vulcans and Humans was the moment this Vulcan met the human Zephram Cochrane.

name: EV Suit Mayweather
flavor: On an away mission to study a comet, Mayweather and Reed get up to a little fun with snow.

name: Straal
flavor: Exomycologist and researcher aboard the USS Glenn. Discovered the mycelial network with Paul Stamets.

ship_action.name: Right now, we have to finish getting ready.

name: Sela in Shadow
flavor: This shadowy figure is the daughter of an alternate timeline Tasha Yar and is sent to drive a wedge between the UFP and the Klingons.

ship_action.name: With Our Cloaking Devices, We Can Slip By You At Will

name: Willie Hawkins
flavor: A famous baseball player and friend of Benny Russell who also flirts with Cassie during Siskos vision.

name: Kal'Hyah Worf
flavor: In preparation for his wedding with Jadzia, Worf and his friends undergo the trials of KalHyah.

ship_action.name: We Must Make The Best Of It

name: Mok'bara Worf
flavor: Worf teaches Jaxa using a fake advancement test he calls a giktail to encourage her to speak up.

name: Handler Worf
flavor: Worf, son of Mogh, of the Houses of Martok and Rhozhenko, bane of the Duras family and slayer of Gowron, breaks his commitment to pacifism to save Raffi.

ship_action.name: I Told You, Do Not Engage

name: Agents Dulmur and Lucsly
flavor: Dulmur and Lucsly found themselves tasked with a humorless investigation into Siskos time aboard Kirks Enterprise.

name: Platonian Chekov
flavor: Transported down for the Platonians' entertainment, Chekov is prepared with a Kironide cocktail to better defend himself.

name: Tribble Chekov
flavor: Chekov accompanies Uhura to the bar aboard Deep Space K-7, where they see a tribble for the very first time.

name: Kal'Hyah O'Brien
flavor: Tormented through the Klingon ritual of kalHyah, OBriens patience is pushed to its limit.

name: Scapegoat O'Brien
flavor: Together with Yates, OBrien puts up an act to distract the guard and let Nog slip into the count room of Frankies casino.

name: Racquetball O'Brien
flavor: Chief O'Brien is strongly determined to beat Doctor Bashir at racquetball.

ship_action.name: I Can Play Any Style You Like

name: Hippie O'Brien
flavor: Trying to find Sisko, OBrien, along with Kira, ends up in the late 1960s, encountering a pair of hippies.

ship_action.name: I Think I Know What Happened

name: O'Brien at the Conn
flavor: O'Brien takes the conn of the Enterprise-D after Lieutenant Torres is frozen by Q.

name: Wedding Groom O'Brien
flavor: One thing OBrien knows for sure is that he loves Keiko and will do anything to marry her.

name: Tobin O'Brien
flavor: A brilliant engineer. In his time, Tobin was known for his original approach to Fermat's Last Theorem. Maybe some of his originality rubbed off on Jadzia after all.

ship_action.name: I Guess I'm a Little Nervous.

name: Albert Macklin
flavor: Writer at Incredible Tales who loves to write about robots more than people.

name: Mok'bara Sito Jaxa
flavor: As part of the ancient ritual of the gik'tal, Jaxa must defend herself against an opponent while blindfolded.

name: Leader Pav
flavor: The leader of the Trill government, Pav was conflicted about Adiras joining with Tal.

name: Klingon West
flavor: In an attempt to assassinate the Federation President, Colonel West dons the disguise of a Klingon.

name: Steward Kyheem
flavor: Kyheem serves as Steward of the Sanctuary in order to protect the Kwejian harvests from sea locusts.

name: Ikhu Zhen Kyheem
flavor: After a long grudge against his brother, Kyheem reconciles with him and even asks him to perform the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his son.

name: Investigator Laris
flavor: Accompanying Picard, Laris leverages illegal Romulan technology to investigate Dahj.

ship_action.name: Thats What We Wanted You to Think

name: Security Laris
flavor: Using her hidden talents, Laris successfully repels the Romulan attack and defends Picard.

name: Second Chance Laris
flavor: Laris dealt with her complicated feelings for Picard a year and a half after Zhabans death.

ship_action.name: We Love Deeply, And Then We Honor That Love By Loving Again

name: Kai Winn
flavor: After the Cardassian occupation, Winn became the first new kai, and her electoral victory was accepted as the 'Will of the Prophets'.

ship_action.name: Honor The Prophets And They Will Always Love You

name: Human Saru
flavor: A malfunctioning holoprogram aboard the wreckage of the KSF Khi'eth made Saru appear human.

name: Captain Saru
flavor: Captain Saru consults his first officer Tilly for recommendations on pithy catchphrases.

name: Returning Saru
flavor: Saru leaves Kaminar and turns down a position as captain to offer Discovery his insight and support.

name: Axum
flavor: With the help of the Voyager crew, Axum set the Unimatrix Zero drones free, and became leader of the resistance movement against the Borg.

name: Mint Julep McCoy
flavor: Leonard McCoy is a big fan of mint juleps and sometimes he prepares one or two to relax.

name: Tribble McCoy
flavor: McCoy suggests an easy solution to the tribble overbreeding problem - quit feeding them.

name: Frantic McCoy
flavor: Doctor McCoy is not happy with Commodore Deckers decision to attack the Doomsday Machine.

name: Base Camp McCoy
flavor: McCoy is not very happy with the way Kirk has chosen to spend his vacation and considers climbing the mountain to be an irresponsible act.

name: Tawi'Yan Alexander
flavor: Alexanders change in deployment accelerates Jadzia and Worfs plans to marry, where he serves as his fathers TawiYanor sword bearer.

name: Ensign Marie Kaplan
flavor: A member of the USS Voyager crew who died while responding to a distress call.

name: General K'Vagh
flavor: K'Vagh oversaw the Klingon Augmentation program, but when this led to the spread of the virus, he kidnapped Phlox to stop the disease.

ship_action.name: I Suggest You Stop Asking Questions

name: Demo Man Scotty
flavor: After rigging a delay detonation device, Scotty is about to beam back to the Enterprise, leaving Kirk face-to-face with the Doomsday Machine.

ship_action.name: Once It's Activated, There's No Way To Stop It

name: Chief Engineer Scott
flavor: While the crew exposed the Khitomer plot, Scotty saved the Federation president by shooting Colonel West.

name: Trill Burnham
flavor: A malfunctioning holoprogram aboard the wreckage of the KSF Khi'eth made Burnham appear Trill.

name: Captain Burnham
flavor: Stepping up as captain of the Discovery, Burnham is ready to face future challenges.

name: Resistance Burnham
flavor: Commander Burnham is always trying to find a peaceful resolution, but is also ready to think outside the box.

name: Inspiring Captain Burnham
