flavor: As captain of the Discovery, Burnham continues her work to reignite the Federation and discover incredible new worlds.

name: Burnham at the Jump
flavor: With the U.S.S. Discovery fully equipped with a spore drive, Captain Burnham prepares to jump to a distressed station.

name: Academy Speech Burnham
flavor: After over a century's absence Starfleet Academy rises again, and its now up to the new graduates to define the future of the Federation.

ship_action.name: I Feel Like Anything is Possible

name: Lt. Rizzo
flavor: Under the direction of Commodore Oh, Narissa poses as a human Starfleet agent in order to hunt biological androids.

ship_action.name: Ive Put My Best Man On It

name: Rurigan
flavor: Male Yaderan who lived on Yadera Prime until it was conquered. Then he created a holographic recreation of his lost village.

ship_action.name: And How Do You Plan To Do That?

name: Cosmo Traitt
flavor: After Cleveland Booker stole his cargo, Traitt tirelessly tracks him down to finish his delivery job.

ship_action.name: The Best Runner in the Quadrant

name: Sutra
flavor: After gaining access to the 'Admonition' via mind meld with Jurati, she convinced her kin to call the ancient Synth beings for protection.

name: Hain
flavor: A former accomplice of Morns who comes looking for the latinum he was cheated out of following a heist years ago.

ship_action.name: A Thousand Bricks of Gold-Pressed Latinum

name: Infected Tryla Scott
flavor: Parasitic beings have infiltrated Starfleet. While Captain Scott is amongst the first to suspect something is wrong, she unfortunately becomes infected by the parasite in the end.

name: Admiral Vance
flavor: The leader of the Federation in 32nd century. After the Burn, his belief that the Federation could be revived was rapidly fading.

ship_action.name: The Past Is The Only Light With Which We Can See The Future.

name: Lt. Commander Bryce
flavor: Being promoted to Lieutenant Commander means an increase in duties for Bryce. Will he find time to kitesurf with his new responsibilities?

ship_action.name: I Used to Kitesurf the Biggest Waves on Manark IV

name: Tallinn
flavor: As one of the mysterious Supervisors, Tallinn watched over and protected Rene Picard throughout the 21st century.

ship_action.name: A Leap of Faith? It's Kind Of How I Roll

name: Anbo-jyutsu Kyle Riker
flavor: Kyle engages in an anbo-jyutsu duel with his son Will, during which the two manage to talk about their differences and end a years-long conflict.

name: Angela Martine
flavor: A phaser gun crewmember, Martine tragically lost her fianc aboard the Enterprise.

name: First Monarch Kaitaama
flavor: Rescued from her abductors by Tucker, Kaitaama finds herself in a tense survival situation very different from her plush royal lifestyle.

ship_action.name: Is Your Entire Species So Ill Mannered?

name: Human Neelix
flavor: The Maitre de was less than successful in his attempts to enforce the dress code when the Borg pursued Picard into his nightclub.

name: Nel Apgar
flavor: With the early arrival of the Enterprise, Apgar attempts to misdirect an investigation into his secretly completed project.

name: Zhaban
flavor: A former Tal Shiar agent, Zhaban is now a housekeeper for Picard, and his wisdom may be the greatest thing he can offer the former officer.

name: Primal Peanut Hamper
flavor: Refusing to carry out a dangerous mission, exocomp Hamper abandoned the ship, after which she became stuck in deep space and then crash-landed on Areolus.

ship_action.name: I Didn't Want To Sound Robotic

name: Princess Thalia and Runa
flavor: Princess Thalia will stay behind guarding her little princess Runa. Should King Ridley fall in battle, she will sing an epic song to honor him.

name: Melora Pazlar
flavor: One of the only handful of Elaysians to have left their homeworld, Melora wishes to explore the stars without giving up being herself.

name: Temporarily Detained Jett Reno
flavor: Bored while shes trapped on Books ship, Reno plays with her food and uses some black licorice to power a communicator to call for help.

ship_action.name: I Have Something That Can Help

name: Ruon Tarka
flavor: Originally tasked with understanding the Dark Matter Anomaly, Ruon Tarka became obsessed with destroying it through dangerous means.

name: Degraded Sphere-Builder
flavor: Promised freedom in exchange for participating in an experiment, this Sphere Builder learned that his only freedom might come in complete cellular degradation.

ship_action.name: When The Xindi Destroy Earth, My People Will Prevail

name: Disorderly Icheb
flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Sevens methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

name: Disguised Janeway
flavor: Janeway and the away team blend into 20th century Los Angeles to pinpoint the location of Captain Braxton.

name: Puppy-Placated Janeway
flavor: With Qs persistent attempts to pursue Janeway romantically, he aims to win her heart by sharing his vulnerability, and a puppy.

name: C.O.P. Janeway
flavor: After guiding Voyager through seven years in the Delta Quadrant, lighting the way for the Federation's predecessor should be a simple matter.

ship_action.name: If the Coalition of Planets Needs Us, We Are Here to Help

name: Tearful Janeway
flavor: Some decisions are too difficult. And despite looking stern during the separation process, Janeway can barely contain her emotions afterward.

name: Borg Queen Jurati
flavor: Having achieved harmony with the Borg Queen's consciousness, Jurati has forged a new and more humane collective aimed at saving lives.

name: Devious Duet Jurati
flavor: In a covert mission to restore the timeline, Jurati takes center stage during a gala, but in her performance it becomes apparent that the Borg Queen has taken over.

name: Adam
flavor: From a group looking for the planet Eden, Adam sought to persuade others through song.

name: Ixtana'Rax
flavor: Ixtana'Rax tried his best to prevent his commander from being tricked by the imprisoned Defiant crew, but he was completely ignored.

name: Grecian Carolyn Palamas
flavor: The object of Apollo's affections, Palamas must choose between her crew and the will of a so-called god.

name: Skorr Tchar
flavor: The Crown Prince of the Skorr. Determined to return his race to their warrior roots, hell do whatever it takes.

ship_action.name: A Noble Death to Win a Great Dream

name: Wonderland Taylor
flavor: Beamed down the rabbit hole, Gillian Taylor is amazed by the transporter technology from the future.

name: Six of Ten
flavor: A Klingon flagship officer who, after becoming a Borg drone, collaborated with Voyager and became part of the movement against the Collective.

ship_action.name: Their Sacrifice Will Not Be Forgotten

name: Amanda Cole
flavor: Amanda was assigned to the Enterprise where she took part in resolving the Xindi incident.

name: Mourned Morn
flavor: Morn faked his own death to avoid his associates attempts to steal his bequest. For once, silence pervades the bar at Quarks.

name: Iden
flavor: Iden led a rebellion of sentient holograms against their Hirogen creators, who made them to serve as prey for training simulations.

name: Commander Pollard
flavor: After traveling to the 32nd century with the rest of the U.S.S. Discovery crew, Dr. Pollard continues her mission to save lives.

name: Lt. Shaxs
flavor: Lieutenant Shaxs is ready and willing to solve any issue with direct confrontation. Lets consider ourselves lucky he is on our side.

name: Heroic Shaxs
flavor: When the entire crew was in danger from the Pakled onslaught, Shaxs sacrificed himself to save the others.

name: Bankrobber Shaxs
flavor: Shaxs and T'Ana  roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

ship_action.name: Everybody Down! This Is A Robbery!

name: Transporter Chief Kyle
flavor: Kyle is very kind, even to those who take aim at him in the middle of the night.

name: "Bullseye" Kyle
flavor: Kyle, transporter chief on the Enterprise, uses the device for an unintended purpose: beaming a gene therapy salve right into Spocks eye.

name: Android Mudd
flavor: Even Mudd's androids have a silver tongue and a hidden knife in their boot to try and weasel out of impossible situations.

name: Nemesis Sacrifice Data
flavor: He sacrifices himself to save Captain Picard and the crew of the USS Enterprise-E in the battle against Praetor Shinzon.

name: Musketeer Data
flavor: A holographic musketeer appears with Datas visage to combat Barclay.

name: Dealer Data
flavor: Data's mastery of statistics and probability means he should beat any player in Starfleet. If only he could read their faces.

ship_action.name: Is That What Is Known As A Poker Face?

name: Professor Data
flavor: In this alternate future, Data holds the Lucasian Chair of mathematics at Cambridge University.

ship_action.name: We Will Get To The Bottom Of This

name: Hollow Data
flavor: Datas encounter with Tam Elbrun and Gomtuu teaches him about the human desire to belong somewhere.

name: Data and Spot
flavor: Data loves his cat Spot so much, he even wrote an Ode to Spot!

ship_action.name: Oh, Spot, The Complex Levels of Behavior You Display!

name: First Officer Data
flavor: Data rises up to First Officer as a replacement for Riker after a rather uptight captain took over the Enterprise in Picards absence.

name: Dress Uniform Data
flavor: In honor of Riker's and Deanna's conjugation Data took the stage and gave a performance that blew everybody away.

ship_action.name: Oh, Blue Skies, Smiling at Meeee

name: Jojo Krako
flavor: Krako was a gangster boss on Sigma Iotia II who managed to stop the violence between two warring gangs through his actions.

ship_action.name: I Haven't Been Arrested In My Whole Life!

name: J'Vini
flavor: For a Qalankhkai, an oath is an unbreakable promise until it is fulfilled. Not even Starfleet officers can stop J'Vini in her mission.

ship_action.name: Come After Me And Your Lives Are Forfeit

name: Master Surchid Falow
flavor: Representing the Wadi, Falow enjoys sharing parts of their culture with the Federation, like their complex and intricate table games.

ship_action.name: Double The Peril, Double Your Winnings

name: Su'Kal
flavor: Su'Kal lives in a hologram made by his mother before her death. To be saved, he must face his greatest fear - another reality

name: Fifth Dimension Invader
flavor: One of the two photonic aliens who mistakenly believed the Captain Proton holodeck program was real and were at war with Doctor Chaotica.

name: First Officer Una
flavor: Una is a talented helmsman (and singer) serving as First Officer under Captain Pike on the USS Enterprise.

name: Huntress Z'ymira
flavor: Its hard for Z'ymira to have a relationship with Sir Adya, having sworn her allegiance to the Forest. Still, she can be an ally to King Ridley

ship_action.name: I Can Shoot It With An Arrow, If That Helps

name: Palor Toff
flavor: Merchant and collector of rare items. He is so passionate about it that he agreed to get on board to evaluate a unique specimen - Commander Data.

name: Ryn
flavor: Though Ryn is forced to implant explosives in his fellow slaves necks, he looks out for them and wants to overthrow Osyraa.

ship_action.name: Who's Ready To Get Out Of Here?

name: Spy Rumdar
flavor: This Pakled spy cannot really tell the difference between the Cerritos and the Enterprise, or between the bathroom and an airlock.

name: Cabaret Georgiou
flavor: Georgious actions during the operation on QonoS earn her an invitation into Section 31 while she is laying low in an Orion cabaret.

ship_action.name: Ill Ask Again--What Do You Want?

name: Ensign Taurik
flavor: A witty and inquisitive Vulcan who befriended several ensigns. He was enthusiastic about his work with La Forge on the warp drive.

name: Tevrin Krit
flavor: Captaining the D-756, Krit happily attempted to claim the bounty against the scoundrel who had stolen from him - Harcourt Mudd.

name: Risa Bashir
flavor: Leeta and Bashir perform the Bajoran Rite of Separation while on Risa.

name: Kal'Hyah Bashir
flavor: A participant in the Klingon ritual of kalHyah, Bashirs endurance is tested through the trials of deprivation, blood, pain, sacrifice, anguish and death.

name: Julius Eaton
flavor: Working for Incredible Tales magazine Julius Eaton wrote about the future and the technologies it might bring.

name: Torias Bashir
flavor: Bashir had no problems with sharing his body for the zhian'tara ritual. But he won't be happy when he finds out what Torias did with it.

ship_action.name: Life Is Too Short To Deprive Yourself Of The Simple Pleasures

name: Assimilated Bashir
flavor: Bashir was assimilated Is it a terrible reality or just a bad joke? Who knows.

ship_action.name: I'm a Doctor, Not a Borg Drone. Oh, wait...

name: Captain Diatta Ndoye
flavor: As a captain in the United Earth Force, Ndoye seems reluctant on diplomacy and more inclined to fire torpedoes. Maybe Saru will teach her a valuable lesson.

name: Doopler Emissary
flavor: As a trade emissary, this Doopler must keep his social anxiety under control to prevent dangerous exponential dooplercation.

name: Ceti Alpha V Khan
flavor: On Ceti Alpha V, Khan did everything to keep his people alive. With the raise of a hand, he immediately has his peoples ears - and their trust.

ship_action.name: I Was a Prince... With Power Over Millions.

name: Kov
flavor: Kov served as an engineer aboard the Vahklas. He struggled with the decision to reconnect with his estranged, ailing father.

name: Tribble Uhura
flavor: Uhura buys a tribble from intergalactic trader.

name: Pathfinder Uhura
flavor: Nyota Uhura's impact on the cosmos cannot be overstated, both on and off the screen.

name: Queen Neve
flavor: The villain of the Kingdom of Elysian, Queen Neve will bring King Ridleys kingdom to its knees until she gets the mercury stone.

name: Technician Uhura
flavor: When all means of communication are destroyed due to Apollo, Uhura manages to establish alternative means of communication and reconnect.

name: EV Suit Uhura
flavor: Deployed to investigate a mysterious asteroid, Uhura discovers that her communication abilities are crucial to the mission.

ship_action.name: So the Right Time for Genius

name: Pirate Tendi
flavor: Tendi is cast as the savage warrior queen who comes from a long line of Orion Pirates, in the Holonovel Crisis Point created by Mariner.

name: Tendi and The Dog
flavor: Tendi's hand-edited, genetically sequenced Dog may not be quite like Earth dogs, but she's still a good girl with some freakish powers.

ship_action.name: Who Has Malleable Protein Bonds? You Do!

name: Ensign Tendi
flavor: Tendi left her pirate days behind to join Starfleet. She brings relentless enthusiasm and friendship to the entire team.

ship_action.name: Did That Full Molecular Engorgement Feel Amazing?!

name: Chief Medical Officer Tendi
flavor: Battling her conscience while serving as CMO in a drill, Tendi might be more dangerous for her Klingon patient than anything he had planned.

name: EV Suit Tendi
flavor: Tendi is helping repair a satellite when a nebula catches her eye. Unfortunately, its at that moment the Cerritos beams away to answer a distress call.

ship_action.name: Wow, Would You Look At That?

name: Mistress of the Winter Constellations
flavor: Prior to joining Starfleet, Tendi was a member of the Orion Syndicate, where she seems to have developed a fearsome reputation.

ship_action.name: Shut Up And Do Your Job!

name: Sanctuary Booker
flavor: Booker went back to his home planet, Kwejian, to save it from the threat by Osyraa.

name: Breakthrough Booker
flavor: Booker cautions that pain isnt how loved ones should be honored, and the 10-C understand. Their empathetic breakthrough halts the DMA.

ship_action.name: That Is The Start of Making Things Right

name: Ikhu Zhen Booker
flavor: According to Kwejian tradition, Booker performed the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his nephew Leto, when a boy becomes a man.

ship_action.name: A Boy Only Becomes A Man Once

name: Liana
flavor: Lianas never seen anyone but her father and the holograms. On meeting the Enterprise crew, she quickly develops feelings for Tucker.

ship_action.name: They Do What I Ask Them To

name: Osyraa
flavor: Her attempts at diplomacy with the Federation having failed, Osyraa hijacks the USS Discovery and attacks Federation HQ.

name: Jaglom Shrek
flavor: An Yridian information dealer who sold Worf the false hope that his father was still alive.

name: George and Gracie
flavor: After being rescued from whalers by Kirk and crew in 1986, these heroes saved the world in the 23rd century by singing at a deep space probe

name: Captain Vasso L'Gaelia
flavor: During negotiations for a potential alliance, Captain Vasso left the Federation delegates baffled by his Rongovian radical empathy.

name: Bruce Maddox
flavor: In pursuit of the truth, Maddox finds himself hunted by the Tal Shiar and chained by debt. His life on the run may be in greater danger than he realizes.

name: Second Chance Gray
flavor: Gray now has a new synthetic body of his own to finally interact with the Discovery crew.

name: Doctor M'Benga
flavor: A talented medic with a secret, MBenga reunites with Pike when he serves aboard the Enterprise.

ship_action.name: Somewhere Out There is the Discovery I Need

name: King Ridley
flavor: MBenga finds himself cast as King Ridley, a hero in search of a precious artifact in his daughters favorite storybook.

name: Fly-Fishing M'Benga
flavor: During his shore leave, MBenga chose a quiet activity - fly-fishing.

name: M'Benga and Oriana
flavor: M'Benga helps Kirk execute their plan to lure out the Gorn, while also taking care of a Valeo Beta V castaway - a young girl named Oriana.

name: Lenore Karidian
flavor: A charming actress, she infiltrated the Enterprise, offering to put on a performance of Hamlet in order to kill anyone who knew of her fathers brutal past.

ship_action.name: I Didn't Think We'd Be Meeting Again So Soon

name: Commander Demos
flavor: An agent of the Dramen government who served Leonard McCoy with an arrest warrant for mass murder on Dramia II.

name: Tactical Stamets
flavor: Stamets, having connected the Discovery to the spore drive, jumps partially into the mycelial network to recover Tilly and May.

name: Varani
flavor: A talented Bajoran musician who dreams of resurrecting the Jaland Forum.

name: Reunion Raffi
flavor: Raffi attempts to reconcile with her son, Gabriel, in the hopes of making up for lost time.

name: 2024 Raffi
flavor: Together with Seven and Rios, Raffi was sent back to 2024 Los Angeles to find the mysterious Watcher, the key to fixing the future.

name: Talosian Keeper
flavor: The Talosian Keeper proves to be the only one capable of healing the fracture in Spocks mind, but only at a personal cost to Burnham.

ship_action.name: Material Illusion Is Our Primary Form Of Defense

name: Tribble Kirk
flavor: Kirk realizes the magnitude of the tribble problem, and orders all tribbles removed from the Enterprise.

name: Anxious Kirk
flavor: A concerned Kirk relays Spock details to help him remember.

name: Judoka Kirk
flavor: Sometimes Captain Kirk uses judo techniques, for example, in self-defense or to get along with someone.

name: EV Suit Kirk
flavor: While exploring the distressed Defiant, Kirk gets trapped in interspace. The only thing keeping him alive is his environmental suit.

name: Chances Taken Kirk
flavor: Kirk is determined to risk his life in order to stop the Doomsday Machine.

ship_action.name: A Chance I'll Have To Take

name: Officiant Kirk
flavor: Kirk was officiating a wedding when the ship went to red alert. The marriage that should have just begun would instead end in tragedy.

ship_action.name: All Captains Have One Happy Privilege - Uniting Two People

name: Farragut Kirk
flavor: In an alternate timeline where Kirk was the captain of the USS Farragut, he and Pike save Outpost 4 from Romulan attack - at great cost.

ship_action.name: Quite The Ship You Got Here

name: Drone Magnus Hansen
flavor: An exobiologist who was assimilated along with his family during the capture of USS Raven.

name: Lt. Commander Mitchell
flavor: After a brief direct contact with negative energy, Gary Mitchell began to display a widening array of godlike abilities.

name: Lieutenant Sahil
flavor: Officially commissioned as a lieutenant, Sahils  dedication to upholding the ideals of the United Federation of Planets is recognized.

name: Barge of the Dead Torres
flavor: While unconscious, Torres finds her mother aboard the Barge of the Dead, bound for GreThor, the realm of the Klingon afterlife meant for dishonored souls.

name: Orbital Skydiving Torres
flavor: B'Elanna engages in increasingly risky behavior in the Holodeck while mourning the loss of her Maquis crewmates.

name: Luau Torres
flavor: Torres appears at the luau in a tropical dress, and looks simply smashing.

ship_action.name: Why Don't You Take a Break?

name: Caretaker Torres
flavor: Torres wakes up in a medical lab, where the Ocampan doctor informs her and Kim that he is protecting his population from 'their' disease.

ship_action.name: I Don't Find This At All Amusing, Starfleet

name: Mirror Marlena Moreau
flavor: It took little time to realize that Kirk was from a different universe. But sending him back wasnt easy.

name: President T'Rina
flavor: As the president of Ni'Var, T'Rina must find a way to preserve the reunification of Vulcans and Romulans as she considers rejoining the Federation.

name: Xindi-Aquatic Councilor
flavor: As part of the Xindi council, the Xindi-Aquatic councilor debates with Archer over whether they were lied to by the Sphere Builders.

name: Underwear Larkin
flavor: Larkin steps out of his quarters in his underwear to witness the consequences of his unauthorized experiments with tribbles.

name: Fal-tor-pan Spock
flavor: After undergoing the Fal-tor-pan ceremony, a revived Spock begins to put his fragmented memory back together.

name: Reunion Spock and Kirk
flavor: As Spock's memories return to him, Kirk with the crew of the Enterprise gathers around him in solidarity.

ship_action.name: I have been and ever shall be your friend.

name: Tribble Spock
flavor: Spock suggests that the cause of the tribbles death was something in the grain they were eating.

name: Spock and I-Chaya
flavor: Spock is reunited with his childhood sehlat companion when investigating his own disappearance from history.

name: Platonian Spock
flavor: Spock is made a telekinetic plaything after failing to appeal to the Platonians sense of logic.

ship_action.name: Take care, young ladies, and value your wine...

name: Prisoner Spock
flavor: With the help of the Talosians, Spock shows Burnham how and why he escaped from the hospital and that he did not kill anyone.

name: Lt. Commander Spock
flavor: Spock begins his tenure on the Enterprise under the command of Captain Pike.

name: Wizard Pollux Spock
flavor: Pollux the wizard, brother of Caster. Maybe Spock is another victim of the fantasy illusion from The Kingdom of Elysian, but my god! Look at that hair!

name: Spock as T'Pring
flavor: The soul-sharing ritual went wrong, but this could be a relationship opportunity for Spock. He deals with TPrings duties in his own style.

ship_action.name: This Is Coming Dangerously Close To Antics

name: Paradise Spock
flavor: On Omicron Ceti III, Spock is exposed to euphoric flower spores that provide pleasure and enjoyment.

name: La Sirena Borg Queen
flavor: The Borg Queen opts for cunning over brute force in her attempts to control Jurati.

ship_action.name: Betrayal Is An Anagram For Believe Me

name: Ensign Jennifer Sh'reyan
flavor: A former member of The Red Shirts Jen aspires to become a captain one day. In the meantime she ignores Mariner and focuses on pottery and yoga.

ship_action.name: Pff...I Don't Think About You At All

name: Tribble Quark
flavor: Quark must deal with an infestation of Tribbles in his bar.

name: Audrid Quark
flavor: Quark became a reluctant host to Audrid and his trepidation only increased when he found his personality at odds with hers.

ship_action.name: The Entity That Lent Me This Body Wishes to Speak

name: EV Suit Reed
flavor: After Mayweather injures his leg while exploring Archers Comet, Reed helps him to escape.

name: Twilight Reed
flavor: In the alternate timeline, Reed was promoted to be captain of the Intrepid. However, he did not assume command due to the Xindi attack.

name: Dahj On The Run
flavor: Her life in danger and her world in shambles, Dahj seeks Picards help.

name: Antedian Assassin
flavor: Masquerading as a dignitary, this assassin boards the Enterprise-D with his comrade to attempt a bombing at an upcoming conference.

name: Admiral Black
flavor: Admiral Black was quick to take charge when the situation called for it, but the animosity and mistrust so rampant in the Terran Empire would be his undoing.

name: Acting Captain Arex
flavor: Amid the rash of strange pranks aboard the Enterprise, Arex takes the role of acting captain while the rest of the bridge crew have lunch.

ship_action.name: We Didn't Cause This To Happen

name: Xahean Adira
flavor: Sneaking medicine down to the landing party of Theta Zeta, Adira appears as a Xahean.

name: Cellist Adira
flavor: Struggling with the loss and nuances of their joining, Adira practices the Cello as a way of connecting with Gray

name: Away Team Adira
flavor: Together with Discovery, Adira goes on their first away mission to repair Deep Space Repair Beta Six because of their experience with programmable matter.

name: Surata IV La Forge
flavor: Geordi uses himself as bait with some hostile vines, knowing he can count on Datas quick android reflexes.

name: All Good Things La Forge
flavor: Due to Q's time rips, La Forge and Picard meet in the future, and La Forge helps the Captain get to the Neutral Zone to close the rifts.

ship_action.name: I'm Trying, But There's a Lot of Interference

name: Dexa
flavor: On a remote asteroid, Dexa stands with her fellow Talaxians against miners who would see their new home destroyed for minerals.

name: T'Pring as Spock
flavor: Once in Spock's body, T'Pring is forced to do all his tasks, including negotiating with the R'ongovians, until the switch is undone.

name: Resistance Rhys
flavor: After escaping from Emerald Chain Regulators, Rhys and the crew of the Discovery help to take back the ship.

name: Syrran
flavor: A Vulcan philosopher who guides Archer and T'Pol across Vulcan's Forge.

name: Lt. Commander Detmer
flavor: With a promotion and a new implant, Detmer is ready to face the trials and adventures the future holds for her.

name: Shroomies
flavor: Highly advanced mysterious species with unknown motives who silently chased and attacked the Enterprise.

name: Croden
flavor: The male Rakhari resisted and fled the government that killed his wives. He tried to save his daughter, though not through the most honest of means.

ship_action.name: Sometimes I Do Tell The Truth

name: Gathorel Labin
flavor: A Sikarian magistrate who revels at the chance to host a ship of aliens and gain as much pleasure from their tales as his people can.

ship_action.name: My Pleasure Will Be Greater Than Yours

name: Captain Angel
flavor: The deceptive captain of the Serene Squall. Angel posed as Doctor Aspen to gain access to the Enterprise and the trust of the crew.

name: Tribbled Koloth and Korax
flavor: Not even the genetically engineered tribble hunting Glommer can manage to dig Koloth and Korax out of this particular pile of troubles.

name: Archaeologist Q
flavor: Q tempts Picard with trips to ancient civilizations to better understand history and archaeology.

name: Luau Q
flavor: In the Delta Quadrant, Q searches for long lost knowledge - romantic advice from Kim and Paris.

name: Union Q
flavor: Q takes Janeway to the Q Continuum recreating the American Civil War to try and explain to her why the Continuum is at war with itself.

name: 25th Century Q
flavor: Q pays Picard an unexpected visit that sets him off on a new path.

name: Dread Pirate Q
flavor: Q would be a tough pirate, wouldn't he? Hes had an eternity to build up an immunity to poisonous powders.

name: Beowulf EMH
flavor: Due to his nature the Doctor was the only one able to rescue crew from the Beowulf holoprogram. This was his very first away mission.

ship_action.name: Emergency! Get Me Out of Here!

name: Kenneth EMH
flavor: The Doctor explores nuclear family life by spending time with a holographic family of his own creation.

ship_action.name: The Coffee Was Quite Good This Morning

name: Tribble Sato
flavor: Sato takes kindly to first contact with a friendly Tribble under the care of Dr. Phlox.

name: Tourist Hoshi Sato
flavor: Hoshi enjoys learning the language of the places she visits. And she fascinates a Risan couple by learning their language and being able to keep up the conversation.

ship_action.name: Na. No. How Am I Doing?

name: Alternate Harry Kim
flavor: After the original Voyagers Kim is killed in a battle with the Viidians, an alternate Voyager sends their own Kim to the original ship with Naomi Wildman in hand.

name: Outpost Vina
flavor: The sole survivor of a survey ship crash on Talos IV, Vina helps the Keeper lure Pike into the Menagerie.

name: Assimilated Esmar
flavor: After the assimilation of Starfleets youngest, Esmar took control of the USS Titan.

name: Kukulkan
flavor: Reappearing after thousands of years, Kukulkan is enraged that almost nobody remembers him and threatens to eliminate all life aboard the Enterprise.

ship_action.name: All of Your Kind Shall Perish!

name: Sarin
flavor: Disillusioned with the Cabals activities, Sarin created her own resistance movement.

ship_action.name: The Price Of Evolution Was Too High

name: Captain Shaw
flavor: Commander of the USS Titan-A, described by Riker as 'not a friendly face'  when he brought Picard and Riker aboard.

ship_action.name: I'm Much More of a Malbec Man

name: Colonel Grat
flavor: This Tandaran officer has no intention of letting Captain Archer leap away - not when he might have intel on the Cabal.

ship_action.name: Your Curiosity Almost Got You Killed

name: Pascal Fullerton
flavor: Chairman of the New Essentialist Movement, Pascal is determined to restore the moral traditions of the Federation.

name: Quarren of the Kyrian
flavor: Quarren was able to reexamine everything he knew about Voyager and his discoveries lead to an understanding between the Kyrians and Vaskans.

ship_action.name: Trying to get home, to Mars

name: Countess Regina Bartholomew
flavor: A woman of breeding, wit and sagacity. Intelligent, insightful and adventurous. She is adored by The Professor.

ship_action.name: Are You Suggesting That It's Beyond My Comprehension?

name: Commander Ransom
flavor: Jack Ransom is the USS Cerritos first officer under Captain Freeman. He has broad shoulders, shiny hair, and where was I going with this?

name: Power Ransom
flavor: During a mission to Apergos, Ransom absorbs a strange energy that gives him great strength and power, but at the same time exposes all his weaknesses.

ship_action.name: I Will Create a Race of Ransomites!

name: Orion Captain
flavor: Under the guise of returning a strobolin stolen from the USS Huron, the Captain is planning something far more dangerous.

ship_action.name: Surrender Your Cargo Or Be Destroyed

name: Graduation Amanda Grayson
flavor: As Burnham's adopted mom, she supported her and reminded her to keep her human side.

name: Luma Rahl Kira
flavor: Kira travels back in time and poses as a comfort woman to learn the truth about her mothers final years.

name: Prophet Kira
flavor: Kira would have been willing to surrender herself to the Prophets no matter what the consequences, even if it meant her death.

ship_action.name: I'll Try Not To Disappoint You

name: Hippie Kira
flavor: While trying to find Sisko, Kira, along with OBrien, ends up in the late 1960s, where they encounter a pair of hippies.

name: Surrogate Kira
flavor: Life aboard Deep Space Nine can be hectic, but nothing can stop Kira, even when she's carrying a baby for the O'Briens.

ship_action.name: Sometimes Innocence is Just an Excuse for the Guilty

name: Lela Kira
flavor: Lela was Dax's first host and one of the first women to serve as a council member. Kira did not hesitate to host such a remarkable figure.

ship_action.name: What is a Person, But The Sum of Their Memories?

name: Colonel Kira Nerys
flavor: Nerys keeps things running on Deep Space Nine, with a few curveballs from Quark every now and then.

name: Captain Clark Terrell
flavor: The captain of the USS Reliant. His mind was overtaken by Khan but with a loyalty so strong he took his own life to protect Kirks.

ship_action.name: What Do You Want With Us?

name: Badge-Challenged Linus
flavor: Linus is having more trouble than most crew members learning to use a personal transporter.

name: Captain Robert DeSoto
flavor: Captain of the USS Hood, DeSoto delivers a sensitive mission and specialist to the Galaxy boys aboard the Enterprise.

name: Jhet'leya
flavor: A crewmate long-presumed-dead who returned to Voyager, pursued by the aliens who revived her.

ship_action.name: There Is A First Time For Everything

name: Battle Beverly Crusher
flavor: Without hesitation, Crusher opens fire on the masked bounty hunters that have infiltrated the SS Eleos XII to protect her son.

name: Captain Tribble
flavor: A particularly perseverant tribble troubles Kirk when it seizes the captain's chair during a dispute with Klingon forces.

name: The Preacher
flavor: A preacher appearing in Siskos visions of Benny Russell. His cryptic words hinted at something beyond the surface.

ship_action.name: Go Now And Write The Truth

name: Vedala Elder
flavor: She gathered the expedition to retrieve the stolen Soul of Alar and prevent the Skorr from starting a holy war.

name: Federation President Rillak
flavor: With the reinvigoration of the Federation, Rillak addresses the first class of Starfleet cadets in over a century.

ship_action.name: Its A Lot to Live Up To. No Pressure

name: Ephraim and Dot
flavor: Originally at odds, Ephraim and Dot helped each other out to escape a dire situation, becoming unlikely friends.

name: Brother Rom
flavor: Quarks younger brother, who has worked for several years in his bar.

name: Bagman Odo
flavor: Together with Nog, Odo steals the money from the safe in the count room of Frankie's casino.

name: Ancient Humanoid
flavor: Likely one of the progenitors of many modern humanoid species, the Ancient Humanoid offers a message of peace and hope.

ship_action.name: If You Can See and Hear me, Our Hope has been Fulfilled

name: The Hansens
flavor: Hansens carried out the first ever research mission to study the Borg that unfortunately came to a disastrous end.

name: Captain Vadic
flavor: Vadic and her team not only managed to escape from the trap, but also captured the Titan, getting even closer to their goal of capturing Jack Crusher.

name: Vadic
flavor: Hungry for revenge against the Federation for the torment they inflicted on her and the other Changelings, she helps a mysterious entity hunt for Jack Crusher.

ship_action.name: How Very Precise With Your Timing

name: Lt. Commander Ortegas
flavor: Helmsman of the U.S.S Enterprise under Captain Pikes command, she brags about being the best pilot to graduate the academy.

name: Off-Duty Ortegas
flavor: As a light practical joke, Ortegas convinces Uhura to wear her dress uniform to the captains table.

ship_action.name: Consider This Your First Square in Enterprise Bingo

name: Sir Adya Ortegas
flavor: Brought into the world of 'The Kingdom of Elysian', Ortegas becomes Sir Adya - the kings faithful and devoted knight.

ship_action.name: My King, We Have Been Led Into A Trap

name: John Frederick Paxton
flavor: A leader of the xenophobic Terra Prime, Paxton turned the Orpheus Mining Complex into a weapon in an effort to expel all aliens from the Sol System.

ship_action.name: A Bloodbath is What Youll Get

name: Chief Engineer Hemmer
flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

name: EV Suit Hemmer
flavor: Trapped in the cargo bay with Uhura, Hemmer dispenses wisdom while trying to dispose of the damaged core.

ship_action.name: I Commend You To The Cosmos

name: Valeo Beta V Hemmer
flavor: As a result of his encounter with the Gorn, Hemmer made the only choice to protect those he loved.

name: Siege Nog
flavor: During the siege of AR-558, Nog performed well as a scout, using his superb Ferengi hearing to spot a large column of advancing Jem'Hadar.

ship_action.name: You Can Count On Me, Sir

name: Zyree
flavor: Zyree helps to coordinate a deal for the Ferengi and a large quantity of Tulaberry wine.

ship_action.name: This Is Where Opportunities Are Made

name: Regency Riker
flavor: An unsuspecting Riker is suddenly swept from a date in Ten Forward into a Jane Austen-esque garden by Amanda Rogerss newfound powers

name: Captain Picard Day Riker
flavor: Riker puts on his best Picard impression to poke fun at the captain.

name: Union Chakotay
flavor: Costumed as a union officer, Chakotay leads the rescue to save Q and Janeway.

name: Amal Chakotay
flavor: Chakotay disguised himself as Amal to infiltrate a Quarren workcamp and rescue the brainwashed crew of Voyager.

ship_action.name: Let Me Prove Who I Am

name: Dreamwalker Chakotay
flavor: Capable of lucid dreaming, Chakotay enters his unconscious mind to discover what is happening to crew who cannot wake up.

ship_action.name: I Know This Is a Dream

name: Vori Defender Chakotay
flavor: Chakotay fights alongside the Vori as a Defender against the Kradin, without realizing hes been placed within an indoctrination program.

name: Luau Chakotay
flavor: Chakotay is having a great time and resting up at the luau, not yet knowing what lies ahead.

name: Henry Starling
flavor: Henry Starling ushers in the computing revolution by salvaging a wrecked time ship. Now, he looks to travel to the future to take even more.

name: EV Suit Garak
flavor: Bribed by Sisko, Garak joins OBriens scavenging operation on the booby-trapped Cardassian station, the Empok Nor.

name: Emony Leeta
flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

name: Rites of Separation Leeta
flavor: While vacationing on Risa, Leeta and Bashir amicably end their relationship with the ancient Bajoran Rite of Separation.

name: Chancellor Azetbur
flavor: As the daughter of Chancellor Gorkon, she succeeds him after his assassination and will do anything to accomplish the future he yearned for.

name: Lt. Commander MacDougal
flavor: Lt. Commander MacDougal rushes to restore control of the ship after the Polywater Virus wreaks havoc on its crew.

name: Lt. JG Kayshon
flavor: As the first Tamarian in Starfleet, Kayshon's time on the Cerritos includes being turned into a puppet and frequent mistranslations.

ship_action.name: Bazminti When He Pulled Back The Veil Vibes

name: Gotana-Retz
flavor: An astronaut from the planet Kelemane, where there was a major time shift. During the Orbital 1 mission, he managed to survive the time shift and help Voyager enter orbit.

name: Holo-Engineer Zimmerman
flavor: Doctor Lewis Zimmerman arrives on Deep Space Nine to use Bashir as the model for his new Long-term Medical Hologram.

ship_action.name: I'm Here To Make You Immortal

name: Admiral Mark Jameson
flavor: Time caught up with Admiral Jameson as he confronted Karnas while negotiating a hostage situation.

ship_action.name: I'm Strong, I'm Alert, I'm Fit!

name: First Contact Barclay
flavor: Barclay is thrilled at the opportunity to meet the inventor of the warp drive himself, Zefram Cochrane.

name: Barclay and Neelix
flavor: On temporary leave, Lieutenant Barclay returns to his apartment on Earth to spend time with his cat Neelix.

ship_action.name: Sorry, Hes Not Used To Company

name: Tam Elbrun
flavor: He was called for a first contact mission in 2366 when an alien intelligence of an organic starship, codenamed 'Tin Man', was discovered.

name: Desert Jake Sisko
flavor: Jake struggles to keep up with his fathers erratic search while tending to his exhausted grandfather.

name: Mutinous Trip Tucker
flavor: Tucker confronts Archer when he, infected with an insectoid, begins to make strange and sometimes dangerous decisions for the crew.

name: Tiron
flavor: Tiron gives Quark generous financial incentive to get him a 'custom' holosuite program featuring Major Kira.

name: Adult Rukiya
flavor: Having merged her consciousness with the entity Debra, Rukiya is free from the sickness that kept her locked away. Now, she is the one telling the stories.

name: Tribble Phlox
flavor: Phlox brings a small number of tribbles aboard Enterprise NX-01 as an easily sustainable food source for his pets.

name: Starfleet Medical Phlox
flavor: Doctor Phlox is busy treating Klaang, who was injured by the Plasma Cannon.

ship_action.name: I'll Do The Best I Can

name: DaiMon Solok
flavor: Hired by Picard, Solok smuggled Picard and his team through Cardassian controlled territory.

ship_action.name: When do you want to leave?

name: Badgey
flavor: A virtual tutor developed by Ensign Rutherford, Badgey can walk you through any Starfleet exercise you can imagine.

ship_action.name: Hi, Can I Teach You A Lesson?

name: Corrupted Badgey
flavor: Corrupted by his creators abuse, Badgey seeks revenge on Rutherford and those he cares about.

ship_action.name: Can I Teach You A Lesson?

name: Tribble Sulu
flavor: A large number of cute tribbles give peace and rest to Sulu.

name: Botanist Sulu
flavor: Sulu enjoyed botany as a hobby, taking care of a carnivorous plant he called Gertrude.

name: Vox
flavor: Thanks to his father, Jack Crusher was able to free himself from the Collective and escape.

ship_action.name: The Time Of The Borg Is Over!

name: Keyla Terrana
flavor: Keyla was a Tandaran disguised as a different species with unclear motives who tried to get close to Archer and question him about the Cabal.

name: Little Boy Blue Wesley
flavor: A period-dressed holoprogram of Wesley Crusher enjoying a picnic with his mother before a fight breaks out.

name: Century Guinan
flavor: Guinan, contemporary to this time period, meets Picard for the first time as he tries to prevent Datas murder.

name: Young Guinan
flavor: The sight of a familiar face gives Picard a spark of hope, but Guinan hasnt yet encountered him and wants no part of whatever he is into.

name: Paul Mayweather
flavor: Though he resented Travis for leaving, Paul was able to fill his fathers shoes as captain thanks to some help from his brother.

ship_action.name: You Do Remember How To Fly This Ship?
